268 Character::normalize();

276
277void player::process_turn()
278{
279 // Has to happen before reset_stats
280 clear_miss_reasons();
281
282 Character::process_turn();
283
284 // If we're actively handling something we can't just drop it on the ground
285 // in the middle of handling it
286 if( activity.targets.empty() ) {
287 drop_invalid_inventory();
288 }
289 process_items();
290 // Didn't just pick something up
291 last_item = itype_id( "null" );
292
293 if( !is_npc() && has_trait( trait_DEBUG_BIONIC_POWER ) ) {
294 mod_power_level( get_max_power_level() );
295 }
296
297 visit_items( [this]( item * e ) {
298 e->process_artifact( this, pos() );
299 e->process_relic( this );
300 return VisitResponse::NEXT;
301 } );
302
303 suffer();
304 // NPCs currently don't make any use of their scent, pointless to calculate it
305 // TODO: make use of NPC scent.
306 if( !is_npc() ) {
307 if( !has_effect( effect_masked_scent ) ) {
308 restore_scent();
309 }
310 const int mask_intensity = get_effect_int( effect_masked_scent );
311
312 // Set our scent towards the norm
313 int norm_scent = 500;
314 int temp_norm_scent = INT_MIN;
315 bool found_intensity = false;
316 for( const trait_id &mut : get_mutations() ) {
317 const cata::optional<int> &scent_intensity = mut->scent_intensity;
318 if( scent_intensity ) {
319 found_intensity = true;
320 temp_norm_scent = std::max( temp_norm_scent, *scent_intensity );
321 }
322 }
323 if( found_intensity ) {
324 norm_scent = temp_norm_scent;
325 }
326
327 for( const trait_id &mut : get_mutations() ) {
328 const cata::optional<int> &scent_mask = mut->scent_mask;
329 if( scent_mask ) {
330 norm_scent += *scent_mask;
331 }
332 }
333
334 //mask from scent altering items;
335 norm_scent += mask_intensity;
336
337 // Scent increases fast at first, and slows down as it approaches normal levels.
338 // Estimate it will take about norm_scent * 2 turns to go from 0 - norm_scent / 2
339 // Without smelly trait this is about 1.5 hrs. Slows down significantly after that.
340 if( scent < rng( 0, norm_scent ) ) {
341 scent++;
342 }
343
344 // Unusually high scent decreases steadily until it reaches normal levels.
345 if( scent > norm_scent ) {
346 scent--;
347 }
348
349 for( const trait_id &mut : get_mutations() ) {
350 scent *= mut.obj().scent_modifier;
351 }
352 }
353
354 // We can dodge again! Assuming we can actually move...
355 if( in_sleep_state() ) {
356 blocks_left = 0;
357 dodges_left = 0;
358 } else if( moves > 0 ) {
359 blocks_left = get_num_blocks();
360 dodges_left = get_num_dodges();
361 }
362
363 // auto-learning. This is here because skill-increases happens all over the place:
364 // SkillLevel::readBook (has no connection to the skill or the player),
365 // player::read, player::practice, ...
366 // Check for spontaneous discovery of martial art styles
367 for( auto &style : autolearn_martialart_types() ) {
368 const matype_id &ma( style );
369
370 if( !martial_arts_data->has_martialart( ma ) && can_autolearn( ma ) ) {
371 martial_arts_data->add_martialart( ma );
372 add_msg_if_player( m_info, _( "You have learned a new style: %s!" ), ma.obj().name );
373 }
374 }
375
376 // Update time spent conscious in this overmap tile for the Nomad traits.
377 if( !is_npc() && ( has_trait( trait_NOMAD ) || has_trait( trait_NOMAD2 ) ||
378 has_trait( trait_NOMAD3 ) ) &&
379 !has_effect( effect_sleep ) && !has_effect( effect_narcosis ) ) {
380 const tripoint_abs_omt ompos = global_omt_location();
381 const point_abs_omt pos = ompos.xy();
382 if( overmap_time.find( pos ) == overmap_time.end() ) {
383 overmap_time[pos] = 1_turns;
384 } else {
385 overmap_time[pos] += 1_turns;
386 }
387 }
388 // Decay time spent in other overmap tiles.
389 if( !is_npc() && calendar::once_every( 1_hours ) ) {
390 const tripoint_abs_omt ompos = global_omt_location();
391 const time_point now = calendar::turn;
392 time_duration decay_time = 0_days;
393 if( has_trait( trait_NOMAD ) ) {
394 decay_time = 7_days;
395 } else if( has_trait( trait_NOMAD2 ) ) {
396 decay_time = 14_days;
397 } else if( has_trait( trait_NOMAD3 ) ) {
398 decay_time = 28_days;
399 }
400 auto it = overmap_time.begin();
401 while( it != overmap_time.end() ) {
402 if( it->first == ompos.xy() ) {
403 it++;
404 continue;
405 }
406 // Find the amount of time passed since the player touched any of the overmap tile's submaps.
407 const tripoint_abs_omt tpt( it->first, 0 );
408 const time_point last_touched = overmap_buffer.scent_at( tpt ).creation_time;
409 const time_duration since_visit = now - last_touched;
410 // If the player has spent little time in this overmap tile, let it decay after just an hour instead of the usual extended decay time.
411 const time_duration modified_decay_time = it->second > 5_minutes ? decay_time : 1_hours;
412 if( since_visit > modified_decay_time ) {
413 // Reduce the tracked time spent in this overmap tile.
414 const time_duration decay_amount = std::min( since_visit - modified_decay_time, 1_hours );
415 const time_duration updated_value = it->second - decay_amount;
416 if( updated_value <= 0_turns ) {
417 // We can stop tracking this tile if there's no longer any time recorded there.
418 it = overmap_time.erase( it );
419 continue;
420 } else {
421 it->second = updated_value;
422 }
423 }
424 it++;
425 }
426 }
427}
428
429void player::recalc_speed_bonus()
430{
431 // Minus some for weight...
432 int carry_penalty = 0;
433 if( weight_carried() > weight_capacity() && !has_trait( trait_id( "DEBUG_STORAGE" ) ) ) {
434 carry_penalty = 25 * ( weight_carried() - weight_capacity() ) / ( weight_capacity() );
435 }
436 mod_speed_bonus( -carry_penalty );
437
438 mod_speed_bonus( -character_effects::get_pain_penalty( *this ).speed );
439
440 if( get_thirst() > thirst_levels::very_thirsty ) {
441 mod_speed_bonus( character_effects::get_thirst_speed_penalty( get_thirst() ) );
442 }
443 // when underweight, you get slower. cumulative with hunger
444 mod_speed_bonus( character_effects::get_kcal_speed_penalty( get_kcal_percent() ) );
445
446 for( const auto &maps : *effects ) {
447 for( auto &i : maps.second ) {
448 if( i.second.is_removed() ) {
449 continue;
450 }
451 bool reduced = resists_effect( i.second );
452 mod_speed_bonus( i.second.get_mod( "SPEED", reduced ) );
453 }
454 }
455
456 // add martial arts speed bonus
457 mod_speed_bonus( mabuff_speed_bonus() );
458
459 // Not sure why Sunlight Dependent is here, but OK
460 // Ectothermic/COLDBLOOD4 is intended to buff folks in the Summer
461 // Threshold-crossing has its charms ;-)
462 if( g != nullptr ) {
463 if( has_trait( trait_SUNLIGHT_DEPENDENT ) && !g->is_in_sunlight( pos() ) ) {
464 mod_speed_bonus( -( g->light_level( posz() ) >= 12 ? 5 : 10 ) );
465 }
466 const float temperature_speed_modifier = mutation_value( "temperature_speed_modifier" );
467 if( temperature_speed_modifier != 0 ) {
468 const auto player_local_temp = get_weather().get_temperature( pos() );
469 if( has_trait( trait_COLDBLOOD4 ) || player_local_temp < 65 ) {
470 mod_speed_bonus( ( player_local_temp - 65 ) * temperature_speed_modifier );
471 }
472 }
473 }
474
475 if( has_artifact_with( AEP_SPEED_UP ) ) {
476 mod_speed_bonus( 20 );
477 }
478 if( has_artifact_with( AEP_SPEED_DOWN ) ) {
479 mod_speed_bonus( -20 );
480 }
481
482 float speed_modifier = Character::mutation_value( "speed_modifier" );
483 set_speed_bonus( static_cast<int>( get_speed() * speed_modifier ) - get_speed_base() );
484
485 if( has_bionic( bio_speed ) ) { // multiply by 1.1
486 set_speed_bonus( static_cast<int>( get_speed() * 1.1 ) - get_speed_base() );
487 }
488
489 double ench_bonus = enchantment_cache->calc_bonus( enchant_vals::mod::SPEED, get_speed() );
490 set_speed_bonus( get_speed() + ench_bonus - get_speed_base() );
491
492 // Speed cannot be less than 25% of base speed, so minimal speed bonus is -75% base speed.
493 const int min_speed_bonus = static_cast<int>( -0.75 * get_speed_base() );
494 if( get_speed_bonus() < min_speed_bonus ) {
495 set_speed_bonus( min_speed_bonus );
496 }
497}
498
499float player::stability_roll() const
500{
501 /** @EFFECT_STR improves player stability roll */
502
503 /** @EFFECT_PER slightly improves player stability roll */
504
505 /** @EFFECT_DEX slightly improves player stability roll */
506
507 /** @EFFECT_MELEE improves player stability roll */
508 return get_melee() + get_str() + ( get_per() / 3.0f ) + ( get_dex() / 4.0f );
509}

521 }
522}
523
524nc_color player::basic_symbol_color() const
525{
526 if( has_effect( effect_onfire ) ) {
527 return c_red;
528 }
529 if( has_effect( effect_stunned ) ) {
530 return c_light_blue;
531 }
532 if( has_effect( effect_boomered ) ) {
533 return c_pink;
534 }
535 if( has_active_mutation( trait_id( "SHELL2" ) ) ) {
536 return c_magenta;
537 }
538 if( underwater ) {
539 return c_blue;
540 }
541 if( has_active_bionic( bio_cloak ) || has_artifact_with( AEP_INVISIBLE ) ||
542 is_wearing_active_optcloak() || has_trait( trait_DEBUG_CLOAK ) ) {
543 return c_dark_gray;
544 }
545 if( move_mode == CMM_RUN ) {
546 return c_yellow;
547 }
548 if( move_mode == CMM_CROUCH ) {
549 return c_light_gray;
550 }
551 return c_white;
552}
553
554void player::mod_stat( const std::string &stat, float modifier )
555{
556 if( stat == "thirst" ) {
557 mod_thirst( modifier );
558 } else if( stat == "fatigue" ) {
559 mod_fatigue( modifier );
560 } else if( stat == "oxygen" ) {
561 oxygen += modifier;
562 } else if( stat == "stamina" ) {
563 mod_stamina( modifier );
564 } else {
565 // Fall through to the creature method.
566 Character::mod_stat( stat, modifier );
567 }
568}
569
570std::list<item *> player::get_artifact_items()
571{
572 std::list<item *> art_items;
573 const invslice &stacks = inv.slice();
574 for( auto &stack : stacks ) {
575 item &stack_iter = stack->front();
576 if( stack_iter.is_artifact() ) {
577 art_items.push_back( &stack_iter );
578 }
579 }
580 for( auto &elem : worn ) {
581 if( elem.is_artifact() ) {
582 art_items.push_back( &elem );
583 }
584 }
585 if( is_armed() ) {
586 if( weapon.is_artifact() ) {
587 art_items.push_back( &weapon );
588 }
589 }
590 return art_items;
591}
592
593bool player::avoid_trap( const tripoint &pos, const trap &tr ) const
594{
595 /** @EFFECT_DEX increases chance to avoid traps */
596
597 /** @EFFECT_DODGE increases chance to avoid traps */
598 int myroll = dice( 3, dex_cur + get_skill_level( skill_dodge ) * 1.5 );
599 int traproll;
600 if( tr.can_see( pos, *this ) ) {
601 traproll = dice( 3, tr.get_avoidance() );
602 } else {
603 traproll = dice( 6, tr.get_avoidance() );
604 }
605
606 return myroll >= traproll;
607}
608
609void player::pause()
610{
611 moves = 0;
612 recoil = MAX_RECOIL;
613
614 // Train swimming if underwater
615 if( !in_vehicle ) {
616 if( underwater ) {
617 practice( skill_swimming, 1 );
618 drench( 100, { {
619 bp_leg_l, bp_leg_r, bp_torso, bp_arm_l,
620 bp_arm_r, bp_head, bp_eyes, bp_mouth,
621 bp_foot_l, bp_foot_r, bp_hand_l, bp_hand_r
622 }
623 }, true );
624 } else if( g->m.has_flag( TFLAG_DEEP_WATER, pos() ) ) {
625 practice( skill_swimming, 1 );
626 // Same as above, except no head/eyes/mouth
627 drench( 100, { {
628 bp_leg_l, bp_leg_r, bp_torso, bp_arm_l,
629 bp_arm_r, bp_foot_l, bp_foot_r, bp_hand_l,
630 bp_hand_r
631 }
632 }, true );
633 } else if( g->m.has_flag( "SWIMMABLE", pos() ) ) {
634 drench( 40, { { bp_foot_l, bp_foot_r, bp_leg_l, bp_leg_r } }, false );
635 }
636 }
637
638 // Try to put out clothing/hair fire
639 if( has_effect( effect_onfire ) ) {
640 time_duration total_removed = 0_turns;
641 time_duration total_left = 0_turns;
642 bool on_ground = has_effect( effect_downed );
643 for( const body_part bp : all_body_parts ) {
644 effect &eff = get_effect( effect_onfire, bp );
645 if( eff.is_null() ) {
646 continue;
647 }
648
649 // TODO: Tools and skills
650 total_left += eff.get_duration();
651 // Being on the ground will smother the fire much faster because you can roll
652 const time_duration dur_removed = on_ground ? eff.get_duration() / 2 + 2_turns : 1_turns;
653 eff.mod_duration( -dur_removed );
654 total_removed += dur_removed;
655 }
656
657 // Don't drop on the ground when the ground is on fire
658 if( total_left > 1_minutes && !is_dangerous_fields( g->m.field_at( pos() ) ) ) {
659 add_effect( effect_downed, 2_turns, num_bp, 0, true );
660 add_msg_player_or_npc( m_warning,
661 _( "You roll on the ground, trying to smother the fire!" ),
662 _( "<npcname> rolls on the ground!" ) );
663 } else if( total_removed > 0_turns ) {
664 add_msg_player_or_npc( m_warning,
665 _( "You attempt to put out the fire on you!" ),
666 _( "<npcname> attempts to put out the fire on them!" ) );
667 }
668 }
669
670 // on-pause effects for martial arts
671 martial_arts_data->ma_onpause_effects( *this );
672
673 if( is_npc() ) {
674 // The stuff below doesn't apply to NPCs
675 // search_surroundings should eventually do, though
676 return;
677 }
678
679 if( in_vehicle && one_in( 8 ) ) {
680 VehicleList vehs = g->m.get_vehicles();
681 vehicle *veh = nullptr;
682 for( auto &v : vehs ) {
683 veh = v.v;
684 if( veh && veh->is_moving() && veh->player_in_control( *this ) ) {
685 double exp_temp = 1 + veh->total_mass() / 400.0_kilogram +
686 std::abs( veh->velocity / 3200.0 );
687 int experience = static_cast<int>( exp_temp );
688 if( exp_temp - experience > 0 && x_in_y( exp_temp - experience, 1.0 ) ) {
689 experience++;
690 }
691 practice( skill_id( "driving" ), experience );
692 break;
693 }
694 }
695 }
696
697 search_surroundings();
698 wait_effects();
699}
700
701void player::search_surroundings()
702{
703 if( controlling_vehicle ) {
704 return;
705 }
706 // Search for traps in a larger area than before because this is the only
707 // way we can "find" traps that aren't marked as visible.
708 // Detection formula takes care of likelihood of seeing within this range.
709 for( const tripoint &tp : g->m.points_in_radius( pos(), 5 ) ) {
710 const trap &tr = g->m.tr_at( tp );
711 if( tr.is_null() || tp == pos() ) {
712 continue;
713 }
714 if( has_active_bionic( bio_ground_sonar ) && !knows_trap( tp ) &&
715 ( tr.loadid == tr_beartrap_buried ||
716 tr.loadid == tr_landmine_buried || tr.loadid == tr_sinkhole ) ) {
717 const std::string direction = direction_name( direction_from( pos(), tp ) );
718 add_msg_if_player( m_warning, _( "Your ground sonar detected a %1$s to the %2$s!" ),
719 tr.name(), direction );
720 add_known_trap( tp, tr );
721 }
722 if( !sees( tp ) ) {
723 continue;
724 }
725 if( tr.is_always_invisible() || tr.can_see( tp, *this ) ) {
726 // Already seen, or can never be seen
727 continue;
728 }
729 // Chance to detect traps we haven't yet seen.
730 if( tr.detect_trap( tp, *this ) ) {
731 if( tr.get_visibility() > 0 ) {
732 // Only bug player about traps that aren't trivial to spot.
733 const std::string direction = direction_name(
734 direction_from( pos(), tp ) );
735 add_msg_if_player( _( "You've spotted a %1$s to the %2$s!" ),
736 tr.name(), direction );
737 }
738 add_known_trap( tp, tr );
739 }
740 }
741}
742
743int player::talk_skill() const
744{
745 /** @EFFECT_INT slightly increases talking skill */
746
747 /** @EFFECT_PER slightly increases talking skill */
748
749 /** @EFFECT_SPEECH increases talking skill */
750 int ret = get_int() + get_per() + get_skill_level( skill_id( "speech" ) ) * 3;
751 return ret;
752}
753
754int player::intimidation() const
755{
756 /** @EFFECT_STR increases intimidation factor */
757 int ret = get_str() * 2;
758 if( weapon.is_gun() ) {
759 ret += 10;
760 }
761 if( weapon.damage_melee( DT_BASH ) >= 12 ||
762 weapon.damage_melee( DT_CUT ) >= 12 ||
763 weapon.damage_melee( DT_STAB ) >= 12 ) {
764 ret += 5;
765 }
766
767 if( get_stim() > 20 ) {
768 ret += 2;
769 }
770 if( has_effect( effect_drunk ) ) {
771 ret -= 4;
772 }
773
774 return ret;
775}
776
777bool player::is_dead_state() const
778{
779 return get_part_hp_cur( bodypart_id( "head" ) ) <= 0 ||
780 get_part_hp_cur( bodypart_id( "torso" ) ) <= 0;
781}
782
783void player::on_dodge( Creature *source, float difficulty )
784{
785 static const matec_id tec_none( "tec_none" );
786
787 // Each avoided hit consumes an available dodge
788 // When no more available we are likely to fail player::dodge_roll
789 dodges_left--;
790
791 // dodging throws of our aim unless we are either skilled at dodging or using a small weapon
792 if( is_armed() && weapon.is_gun() ) {
793 recoil += std::max( weapon.volume() / 250_ml - get_skill_level( skill_dodge ), 0 ) * rng( 0, 100 );
794 recoil = std::min( MAX_RECOIL, recoil );
795 }
796
797 // Even if we are not to train still call practice to prevent skill rust
798 difficulty = std::max( difficulty, 0.0f );
799 practice( skill_dodge, difficulty * 2, difficulty );
800
801 martial_arts_data->ma_ondodge_effects( *this );
802
803 // For adjacent attackers check for techniques usable upon successful dodge
804 if( source && square_dist( pos(), source->pos() ) == 1 ) {
805 matec_id tec = pick_technique( *source, used_weapon(), false, true, false );
806
807 if( tec != tec_none && !is_dead_state() ) {
808 if( get_stamina() < get_stamina_max() / 3 ) {
809 add_msg( m_bad, _( "You try to counterattack but you are too exhausted!" ) );
810 } else {
811 melee_attack( *source, false, tec );
812 }
813 }
814 }
815}
816
817void player::on_hit( Creature *source, bodypart_id bp_hit,
818 float /*difficulty*/, dealt_projectile_attack const *const proj )
819{
820 check_dead_state();
821 if( source == nullptr || proj != nullptr ) {
822 return;
823 }
824
825 bool u_see = g->u.sees( *this );
826 if( has_active_bionic( bionic_id( "bio_ods" ) ) && get_power_level() > 5_kJ ) {
827 if( is_player() ) {
828 add_msg( m_good, _( "Your offensive defense system shocks %s in mid-attack!" ),
829 source->disp_name() );
830 } else if( u_see ) {
831 add_msg( _( "%1$s's offensive defense system shocks %2$s in mid-attack!" ),
832 disp_name(),
833 source->disp_name() );
834 }
835 int shock = rng( 1, 4 );
836 mod_power_level( units::from_kilojoule( -shock ) );
837 damage_instance ods_shock_damage;
838 ods_shock_damage.add_damage( DT_ELECTRIC, shock * 5 );
839 // Should hit body part used for attack
840 source->deal_damage( this, bodypart_id( "torso" ), ods_shock_damage );
841 }
842 if( !wearing_something_on( bp_hit ) &&
843 ( has_trait( trait_SPINES ) || has_trait( trait_QUILLS ) ) ) {
844 int spine = rng( 1, has_trait( trait_QUILLS ) ? 20 : 8 );
845 if( !is_player() ) {
846 if( u_see ) {
847 add_msg( _( "%1$s's %2$s puncture %3$s in mid-attack!" ), name,
848 ( has_trait( trait_QUILLS ) ? _( "quills" ) : _( "spines" ) ),
849 source->disp_name() );
850 }
851 } else {
852 add_msg( m_good, _( "Your %1$s puncture %2$s in mid-attack!" ),
853 ( has_trait( trait_QUILLS ) ? _( "quills" ) : _( "spines" ) ),
854 source->disp_name() );
855 }
856 damage_instance spine_damage;
857 spine_damage.add_damage( DT_STAB, spine );
858 source->deal_damage( this, bodypart_id( "torso" ), spine_damage );
859 }
860 if( ( !( wearing_something_on( bp_hit ) ) ) && ( has_trait( trait_THORNS ) ) &&
861 ( !( source->has_weapon() ) ) ) {
862 if( !is_player() ) {
863 if( u_see ) {
864 add_msg( _( "%1$s's %2$s scrape %3$s in mid-attack!" ), name,
865 _( "thorns" ), source->disp_name() );
866 }
867 } else {
868 add_msg( m_good, _( "Your thorns scrape %s in mid-attack!" ), source->disp_name() );
869 }
870 int thorn = rng( 1, 4 );
871 damage_instance thorn_damage;
872 thorn_damage.add_damage( DT_CUT, thorn );
873 // In general, critters don't have separate limbs
874 // so safer to target the torso
875 source->deal_damage( this, bodypart_id( "torso" ), thorn_damage );
876 }
877 if( ( !( wearing_something_on( bp_hit ) ) ) && ( has_trait( trait_CF_HAIR ) ) ) {
878 if( !is_player() ) {
879 if( u_see ) {
880 add_msg( _( "%1$s gets a load of %2$s's %3$s stuck in!" ), source->disp_name(),
881 name, ( _( "hair" ) ) );
882 }
883 } else {
884 add_msg( m_good, _( "Your hairs detach into %s!" ), source->disp_name() );
885 }
886 source->add_effect( effect_stunned, 2_turns );
887 if( one_in( 3 ) ) { // In the eyes!
888 source->add_effect( effect_blind, 2_turns );
889 }
890 }
891 if( worn_with_flag( "REQUIRES_BALANCE" ) && !has_effect( effect_downed ) ) {
892 int rolls = 4;
893 if( worn_with_flag( "ROLLER_ONE" ) ) {
894 rolls += 2;
895 }
896 if( has_trait( trait_PROF_SKATER ) ) {
897 rolls--;
898 }
899 if( has_trait( trait_DEFT ) ) {
900 rolls--;
901 }
902
903 if( stability_roll() < dice( rolls, 10 ) ) {
904 if( !is_player() ) {
905 if( u_see ) {
906 add_msg( _( "%1$s loses their balance while being hit!" ), name );
907 }
908 } else {
909 add_msg( m_bad, _( "You lose your balance while being hit!" ) );
910 }
911 // This kind of downing is not subject to immunity.
912 add_effect( effect_downed, 2_turns, num_bp, 0, true );
913 }
914 }
915 Character::on_hit( source, bp_hit, 0.0f, proj );
916}
917
918int player::get_lift_assist() const
919{
920 int result = 0;
921 const std::vector<npc *> helpers = get_crafting_helpers();
922 for( const npc *np : helpers ) {
923 result += np->get_str();
924 }
925 return result;
926}
927
928bool player::immune_to( body_part bp, damage_unit dam ) const
929{
930 if( has_trait( trait_DEBUG_NODMG ) || is_immune_damage( dam.type ) ) {
931 return true;
932 }
933
934 passive_absorb_hit( convert_bp( bp ).id(), dam );
935
936 for( const item &cloth : worn ) {
937 if( cloth.get_coverage() == 100 && cloth.covers( bp ) ) {
938 cloth.mitigate_damage( dam );
939 }
940 }
941
942 return dam.amount <= 0;
943}
944
945void player::mod_pain( int npain )
946{
947 if( npain > 0 ) {
948 if( has_trait( trait_NOPAIN ) || has_effect( effect_narcosis ) ) {
949 return;
950 }
951 // always increase pain gained by one from these bad mutations
952 if( has_trait( trait_MOREPAIN ) ) {
953 npain += std::max( 1, roll_remainder( npain * 0.25 ) );
954 } else if( has_trait( trait_MOREPAIN2 ) ) {
955 npain += std::max( 1, roll_remainder( npain * 0.5 ) );
956 } else if( has_trait( trait_MOREPAIN3 ) ) {
957 npain += std::max( 1, roll_remainder( npain * 1.0 ) );
958 }
959
960 if( npain > 1 ) {
961 // if it's 1 it'll just become 0, which is bad
962 if( has_trait( trait_PAINRESIST_TROGLO ) ) {
963 npain = roll_remainder( npain * 0.5 );
964 } else if( has_trait( trait_PAINRESIST ) ) {
965 npain = roll_remainder( npain * 0.67 );
966 }
967 }
968 }
969 Creature::mod_pain( npain );
970}
971
972void player::set_pain( int npain )
973{
974 const int prev_pain = get_perceived_pain();
975 Creature::set_pain( npain );
976 const int cur_pain = get_perceived_pain();
977
978 if( cur_pain != prev_pain ) {
979 react_to_felt_pain( cur_pain - prev_pain );
980 on_stat_change( "perceived_pain", cur_pain );
981 }
982}
983
984int player::get_perceived_pain() const
985{
986 if( get_effect_int( effect_adrenaline ) > 1 ) {
987 return 0;
988 }
989
990 return std::max( get_pain() - get_painkiller(), 0 );
991}
992
993float player::fall_damage_mod() const
994{
995 if( has_effect_with_flag( "EFFECT_FEATHER_FALL" ) ) {
996 return 0.0f;
997 }
998 float ret = 1.0f;
999
1000 // Ability to land properly is 2x as important as dexterity itself
1001 /** @EFFECT_DEX decreases damage from falling */
1002
1003 /** @EFFECT_DODGE decreases damage from falling */
1004 float dex_dodge = dex_cur / 2.0 + get_skill_level( skill_dodge );
1005 // Penalize for wearing heavy stuff
1006 const float average_leg_encumb = ( encumb( bp_leg_l ) + encumb( bp_leg_r ) ) / 2.0;
1007 dex_dodge -= ( average_leg_encumb + encumb( bp_torso ) ) / 10;
1008 // But prevent it from increasing damage
1009 dex_dodge = std::max( 0.0f, dex_dodge );
1010 // 100% damage at 0, 75% at 10, 50% at 20 and so on
1011 ret *= ( 100.0f - ( dex_dodge * 4.0f ) ) / 100.0f;
1012
1013 if( has_trait( trait_PARKOUR ) ) {
1014 ret *= 2.0f / 3.0f;
1015 }
1016
1017 // TODO: Bonus for Judo, mutations. Penalty for heavy weight (including mutations)
1018 return std::max( 0.0f, ret );
1019}
1020
1021// force is maximum damage to hp before scaling
1022int player::impact( const int force, const tripoint &p )
1023{
1024 // Falls over ~30m are fatal more often than not
1025 // But that would be quite a lot considering 21 z-levels in game
1026 // so let's assume 1 z-level is comparable to 30 force
1027
1028 if( force <= 0 ) {
1029 return force;
1030 }
1031
1032 // Damage modifier (post armor)
1033 float mod = 1.0f;
1034 int effective_force = force;
1035 int cut = 0;
1036 // Percentage armor penetration - armor won't help much here
1037 // TODO: Make cushioned items like bike helmets help more
1038 float armor_eff = 1.0f;
1039 // Shock Absorber CBM heavily reduces damage
1040 const bool shock_absorbers = has_active_bionic( bionic_id( "bio_shock_absorber" ) );
1041
1042 // Being slammed against things rather than landing means we can't
1043 // control the impact as well
1044 const bool slam = p != pos();
1045 std::string target_name = "a swarm of bugs";
1046 Creature *critter = g->critter_at( p );
1047 if( critter != this && critter != nullptr ) {
1048 target_name = critter->disp_name();
1049 // Slamming into creatures and NPCs
1050 // TODO: Handle spikes/horns and hard materials
1051 armor_eff = 0.5f; // 2x as much as with the ground
1052 // TODO: Modify based on something?
1053 mod = 1.0f;
1054 effective_force = force;
1055 } else if( const optional_vpart_position vp = g->m.veh_at( p ) ) {
1056 // Slamming into vehicles
1057 // TODO: Integrate it with vehicle collision function somehow
1058 target_name = vp->vehicle().disp_name();
1059 if( vp.part_with_feature( "SHARP", true ) ) {
1060 // Now we're actually getting impaled
1061 cut = force; // Lots of fun
1062 }
1063
1064 mod = slam ? 1.0f : fall_damage_mod();
1065 armor_eff = 0.25f; // Not much
1066 if( !slam && vp->part_with_feature( "ROOF", true ) ) {
1067 // Roof offers better landing than frame or pavement
1068 // TODO: Make this not happen with heavy duty/plated roof
1069 effective_force /= 2;
1070 }
1071 } else {
1072 // Slamming into terrain/furniture
1073 target_name = g->m.disp_name( p );
1074 int hard_ground = g->m.has_flag( TFLAG_DIGGABLE, p ) ? 0 : 3;
1075 armor_eff = 0.25f; // Not much
1076 // Get cut by stuff
1077 // This isn't impalement on metal wreckage, more like flying through a closed window
1078 cut = g->m.has_flag( TFLAG_SHARP, p ) ? 5 : 0;
1079 effective_force = force + hard_ground;
1080 mod = slam ? 1.0f : fall_damage_mod();
1081 if( g->m.has_furn( p ) ) {
1082 // TODO: Make furniture matter
1083 } else if( g->m.has_flag( TFLAG_SWIMMABLE, p ) ) {
1084 // TODO: Some formula of swimming
1085 effective_force /= 4;
1086 }
1087 }
1088
1089 // Rescale for huge force
1090 // At >30 force, proper landing is impossible and armor helps way less
1091 if( effective_force > 30 ) {
1092 // Armor simply helps way less
1093 armor_eff *= 30.0f / effective_force;
1094 if( mod < 1.0f ) {
1095 // Everything past 30 damage gets a worse modifier
1096 const float scaled_mod = std::pow( mod, 30.0f / effective_force );
1097 const float scaled_damage = ( 30.0f * mod ) + scaled_mod * ( effective_force - 30.0f );
1098 mod = scaled_damage / effective_force;
1099 }
1100 }
1101
1102 if( !slam && mod < 1.0f && mod * force < 5 ) {
1103 // Perfect landing, no damage (regardless of armor)
1104 add_msg_if_player( m_warning, _( "You land on %s." ), target_name );
1105 return 0;
1106 }
1107
1108 // Shock absorbers kick in only when they need to, so if our other protections fail, fall back on them
1109 if( shock_absorbers ) {
1110 effective_force -= 15; // Provide a flat reduction to force
1111 if( mod > 0.25f ) {
1112 mod = 0.25f; // And provide a 75% reduction against that force if we don't have it already
1113 }
1114 if( effective_force < 0 ) {
1115 effective_force = 0;
1116 }
1117 }
1118
1119 int total_dealt = 0;
1120 if( mod * effective_force >= 5 ) {
1121 for( int i = 0; i < num_hp_parts; i++ ) {
1122 const bodypart_id bp = convert_bp( hp_to_bp( static_cast<hp_part>( i ) ) ).id();
1123 const int bash = effective_force * rng( 60, 100 ) / 100;
1124 damage_instance di;
1125 di.add_damage( DT_BASH, bash, 0, armor_eff, mod );
1126 // No good way to land on sharp stuff, so here modifier == 1.0f
1127 di.add_damage( DT_CUT, cut, 0, armor_eff, 1.0f );
1128 total_dealt += deal_damage( nullptr, bp, di ).total_damage();
1129 }
1130 }
1131
1132 if( total_dealt > 0 && is_player() ) {
1133 // "You slam against the dirt" is fine
1134 add_msg( m_bad, _( "You are slammed against %1$s for %2$d damage." ),
1135 target_name, total_dealt );
1136 } else if( is_player() && shock_absorbers ) {
1137 add_msg( m_bad, _( "You are slammed against %s!" ),
1138 target_name, total_dealt );
1139 add_msg( m_good, _( "but your shock absorbers negate the damage!" ) );
1140 } else if( slam ) {
1141 // Only print this line if it is a slam and not a landing
1142 // Non-players should only get this one: player doesn't know how much damage was dealt
1143 // and landing messages for each slammed creature would be too much
1144 add_msg_player_or_npc( m_bad,
1145 _( "You are slammed against %s." ),
1146 _( "<npcname> is slammed against %s." ),
1147 target_name );
1148 } else {
1149 // No landing message for NPCs
1150 add_msg_if_player( m_warning, _( "You land on %s." ), target_name );
1151 }
1152
1153 if( x_in_y( mod, 1.0f ) ) {
1154 add_effect( effect_downed, rng( 1_turns, 1_turns + mod * 3_turns ) );
1155 }
1156
1157 return total_dealt;
1158}
1159
1160void player::knock_back_to( const tripoint &to )
1161{
1162 if( to == pos() ) {
1163 return;
1164 }
1165
1166 if( rl_dist( pos(), to ) < 2 && get_map().obstructed_by_vehicle_rotation( pos(), to ) ) {
1167 tripoint intervening = to;
1168 if( one_in( 2 ) ) {
1169 intervening.x = pos().x;
1170 } else {
1171 intervening.y = pos().y;
1172 }
1173
1174 apply_damage( nullptr, bodypart_id( "torso" ), 3 );
1175 add_effect( effect_stunned, 2_turns );
1176 add_msg_player_or_npc( _( "You bounce off a %s!" ), _( "<npcname> bounces off a %s!" ),
1177 g->m.obstacle_name( intervening ) );
1178 return;
1179 }
1180
1181 // First, see if we hit a monster
1182 if( monster *const critter = g->critter_at<monster>( to ) ) {
1183 deal_damage( critter, bodypart_id( "torso" ), damage_instance( DT_BASH, critter->type->size ) );
1184 add_effect( effect_stunned, 1_turns );
1185 /** @EFFECT_STR_MAX allows knocked back player to knock back, damage, stun some monsters */
1186 if( ( str_max - 6 ) / 4 > critter->type->size ) {
1187 critter->knock_back_from( pos() ); // Chain reaction!
1188 critter->apply_damage( this, bodypart_id( "torso" ), ( str_max - 6 ) / 4 );
1189 critter->add_effect( effect_stunned, 1_turns );
1190 } else if( ( str_max - 6 ) / 4 == critter->type->size ) {
1191 critter->apply_damage( this, bodypart_id( "torso" ), ( str_max - 6 ) / 4 );
1192 critter->add_effect( effect_stunned, 1_turns );
1193 }
1194 critter->check_dead_state();
1195
1196 add_msg_player_or_npc( _( "You bounce off a %s!" ), _( "<npcname> bounces off a %s!" ),
1197 critter->name() );
1198 return;
1199 }
1200
1201 if( npc *const np = g->critter_at<npc>( to ) ) {
1202 deal_damage( np, bodypart_id( "torso" ), damage_instance( DT_BASH, np->get_size() + 1 ) );
1203 add_effect( effect_stunned, 1_turns );
1204 np->deal_damage( this, bodypart_id( "torso" ), damage_instance( DT_BASH, 3 ) );
1205 add_msg_player_or_npc( _( "You bounce off %s!" ), _( "<npcname> bounces off %s!" ),
1206 np->name );
1207 np->check_dead_state();
1208 return;
1209 }
1210
1211 // If we're still in the function at this point, we're actually moving a tile!
1212 if( g->m.has_flag( "LIQUID", to ) && g->m.has_flag( TFLAG_DEEP_WATER, to ) ) {
1213 if( !is_npc() ) {
1214 avatar_action::swim( g->m, g->u, to );
1215 }
1216 // TODO: NPCs can't swim!
1217 } else if( g->m.impassable( to ) ) { // Wait, it's a wall
1218
1219 // It's some kind of wall.
1220 // TODO: who knocked us back? Maybe that creature should be the source of the damage?
1221 apply_damage( nullptr, bodypart_id( "torso" ), 3 );
1222 add_effect( effect_stunned, 2_turns );
1223 add_msg_player_or_npc( _( "You bounce off a %s!" ), _( "<npcname> bounces off a %s!" ),
1224 g->m.obstacle_name( to ) );
1225
1226 } else { // It's no wall
1227 setpos( to );
1228 }
1229}
1230
1231int player::hp_percentage() const
1232{
1233 const bodypart_id head_id = bodypart_id( "head" );
1234 const bodypart_id torso_id = bodypart_id( "torso" );
1235 int total_cur = 0;
1236 int total_max = 0;
1237 // Head and torso HP are weighted 3x and 2x, respectively
1238 total_cur = get_part_hp_cur( head_id ) * 3 + get_part_hp_cur( torso_id ) * 2;
1239 total_max = get_part_hp_max( head_id ) * 3 + get_part_hp_max( torso_id ) * 2;
1240 for( const std::pair< const bodypart_str_id, bodypart> &elem : get_body() ) {
1241 total_cur += elem.second.get_hp_cur();
1242 total_max += elem.second.get_hp_max();
1243 }
1244
1245 return ( 100 * total_cur ) / total_max;
1246}
1247
1248void player::add_pain_msg( int val, body_part bp ) const
1249{
1250 if( has_trait( trait_NOPAIN ) ) {
1251 return;
1252 }
1253 if( bp == num_bp ) {
1254 if( val > 20 ) {
1255 add_msg_if_player( _( "Your body is wracked with excruciating pain!" ) );
1256 } else if( val > 10 ) {
1257 add_msg_if_player( _( "Your body is wracked with terrible pain!" ) );
1258 } else if( val > 5 ) {
1259 add_msg_if_player( _( "Your body is wracked with pain!" ) );
1260 } else if( val > 1 ) {
1261 add_msg_if_player( _( "Your body pains you!" ) );
1262 } else {
1263 add_msg_if_player( _( "Your body aches." ) );
1264 }
1265 } else {
1266 if( val > 20 ) {
1267 add_msg_if_player( _( "Your %s is wracked with excruciating pain!" ),
1268 body_part_name_accusative( bp ) );
1269 } else if( val > 10 ) {
1270 add_msg_if_player( _( "Your %s is wracked with terrible pain!" ),
1271 body_part_name_accusative( bp ) );
1272 } else if( val > 5 ) {
1273 add_msg_if_player( _( "Your %s is wracked with pain!" ),
1274 body_part_name_accusative( bp ) );
1275 } else if( val > 1 ) {
1276 add_msg_if_player( _( "Your %s pains you!" ),
1277 body_part_name_accusative( bp ) );
1278 } else {
1279 add_msg_if_player( _( "Your %s aches." ),
1280 body_part_name_accusative( bp ) );
1281 }
1282 }
1283}
1284
1285void player::process_one_effect( effect &it, bool is_new )
1286{
1287 bool reduced = resists_effect( it );
1288 double mod = 1;
1289 body_part bp = it.get_bp()->token;
1290 int val = 0;
1291
1292 // Still hardcoded stuff, do this first since some modify their other traits
1293 hardcoded_effects( it );
1294
1295 const auto get_effect = [&it, is_new]( const std::string & arg, bool reduced ) {
1296 if( is_new ) {
1297 return it.get_amount( arg, reduced );
1298 }
1299 return it.get_mod( arg, reduced );
1300 };
1301
1302 // Handle miss messages
1303 auto msgs = it.get_miss_msgs();
1304 if( !msgs.empty() ) {
1305 for( const auto &i : msgs ) {
1306 add_miss_reason( _( i.first ), static_cast<unsigned>( i.second ) );
1307 }
1308 }
1309
1310 // Handle health mod
1311 val = get_effect( "H_MOD", reduced );
1312 if( val != 0 ) {
1313 mod = 1;
1314 if( is_new || it.activated( calendar::turn, "H_MOD", val, reduced, mod ) ) {
1315 int bounded = bound_mod_to_vals(
1316 get_healthy_mod(), val, it.get_max_val( "H_MOD", reduced ),
1317 it.get_min_val( "H_MOD", reduced ) );
1318 // This already applies bounds, so we pass them through.
1319 mod_healthy_mod( bounded, get_healthy_mod() + bounded );
1320 }
1321 }
1322
1323 // Handle health
1324 val = get_effect( "HEALTH", reduced );
1325 if( val != 0 ) {
1326 mod = 1;
1327 if( is_new || it.activated( calendar::turn, "HEALTH", val, reduced, mod ) ) {
1328 mod_healthy( bound_mod_to_vals( get_healthy(), val,
1329 it.get_max_val( "HEALTH", reduced ), it.get_min_val( "HEALTH", reduced ) ) );
1330 }
1331 }
1332
1333 // Handle stim
1334 val = get_effect( "STIM", reduced );
1335 if( val != 0 ) {
1336 mod = 1;
1337 if( is_new || it.activated( calendar::turn, "STIM", val, reduced, mod ) ) {
1338 mod_stim( bound_mod_to_vals( get_stim(), val, it.get_max_val( "STIM", reduced ),
1339 it.get_min_val( "STIM", reduced ) ) );
1340 }
1341 }
1342
1343 // Handle hunger
1344 val = get_effect( "HUNGER", reduced );
1345 if( val != 0 ) {
1346 mod = 1;
1347 if( is_new || it.activated( calendar::turn, "HUNGER", val, reduced, mod ) ) {
1348 mod_stored_kcal( -10 * bound_mod_to_vals( ( max_stored_kcal() - get_stored_kcal() ) / 10,
1349 val, it.get_max_val( "HUNGER", reduced ), it.get_min_val( "HUNGER", reduced ) ) );
1350 }
1351 }
1352
1353 // Handle thirst
1354 val = get_effect( "THIRST", reduced );
1355 if( val != 0 ) {
1356 mod = 1;
1357 if( is_new || it.activated( calendar::turn, "THIRST", val, reduced, mod ) ) {
1358 mod_thirst( bound_mod_to_vals( get_thirst(), val, it.get_max_val( "THIRST", reduced ),
1359 it.get_min_val( "THIRST", reduced ) ) );
1360 }
1361 }
1362
1363 // Handle fatigue
1364 val = get_effect( "FATIGUE", reduced );
1365 // Prevent ongoing fatigue effects while asleep.
1366 // These are meant to change how fast you get tired, not how long you sleep.
1367 if( val != 0 && !in_sleep_state() ) {
1368 mod = 1;
1369 if( is_new || it.activated( calendar::turn, "FATIGUE", val, reduced, mod ) ) {
1370 mod_fatigue( bound_mod_to_vals( get_fatigue(), val, it.get_max_val( "FATIGUE", reduced ),
1371 it.get_min_val( "FATIGUE", reduced ) ) );
1372 }
1373 }
1374
1375 // Handle Radiation
1376 val = get_effect( "RAD", reduced );
1377 if( val != 0 ) {
1378 mod = 1;
1379 if( is_new || it.activated( calendar::turn, "RAD", val, reduced, mod ) ) {
1380 mod_rad( bound_mod_to_vals( get_rad(), val, it.get_max_val( "RAD", reduced ), 0 ) );
1381 // Radiation can't go negative
1382 if( get_rad() < 0 ) {
1383 set_rad( 0 );
1384 }
1385 }
1386 }
1387
1388 // Handle Pain
1389 val = get_effect( "PAIN", reduced );
1390 if( val != 0 ) {
1391 mod = 1;
1392 if( it.get_sizing( "PAIN" ) ) {
1393 if( has_trait( trait_FAT ) ) {
1394 mod *= 1.5;
1395 }
1396 if( get_size() == MS_LARGE ) {
1397 mod *= 2;
1398 }
1399 if( get_size() == MS_HUGE ) {
1400 mod *= 3;
1401 }
1402 }
1403 if( is_new || it.activated( calendar::turn, "PAIN", val, reduced, mod ) ) {
1404 int pain_inc = bound_mod_to_vals( get_pain(), val, it.get_max_val( "PAIN", reduced ), 0 );
1405 mod_pain( pain_inc );
1406 if( pain_inc > 0 ) {
1407 add_pain_msg( val, bp );
1408 }
1409 }
1410 }
1411
1412 // Handle Damage
1413 val = get_effect( "HURT", reduced );
1414 if( val != 0 ) {
1415 mod = 1;
1416 if( it.get_sizing( "HURT" ) ) {
1417 if( has_trait( trait_FAT ) ) {
1418 mod *= 1.5;
1419 }
1420 if( get_size() == MS_LARGE ) {
1421 mod *= 2;
1422 }
1423 if( get_size() == MS_HUGE ) {
1424 mod *= 3;
1425 }
1426 }
1427 if( is_new || it.activated( calendar::turn, "HURT", val, reduced, mod ) ) {
1428 if( bp == num_bp ) {
1429 if( val > 5 ) {
1430 add_msg_if_player( _( "Your %s HURTS!" ), body_part_name_accusative( bp_torso ) );
1431 } else {
1432 add_msg_if_player( _( "Your %s hurts!" ), body_part_name_accusative( bp_torso ) );
1433 }
1434 apply_damage( nullptr, bodypart_id( "torso" ), val, true );
1435 } else {
1436 if( val > 5 ) {
1437 add_msg_if_player( _( "Your %s HURTS!" ), body_part_name_accusative( bp ) );
1438 } else {
1439 add_msg_if_player( _( "Your %s hurts!" ), body_part_name_accusative( bp ) );
1440 }
1441 apply_damage( nullptr, convert_bp( bp ).id(), val, true );
1442 }
1443 }
1444 }
1445
1446 // Handle Sleep
1447 val = get_effect( "SLEEP", reduced );
1448 if( val != 0 ) {
1449 mod = 1;
1450 if( ( is_new || it.activated( calendar::turn, "SLEEP", val, reduced, mod ) ) &&
1451 !has_effect( efftype_id( "sleep" ) ) ) {
1452 add_msg_if_player( _( "You pass out!" ) );
1453 fall_asleep( time_duration::from_turns( val ) );
1454 }
1455 }
1456
1457 // Handle painkillers
1458 val = get_effect( "PKILL", reduced );
1459 if( val != 0 ) {
1460 mod = it.get_addict_mod( "PKILL", addiction_level( add_type::PKILLER ) );
1461 if( is_new || it.activated( calendar::turn, "PKILL", val, reduced, mod ) ) {
1462 mod_painkiller( bound_mod_to_vals( get_painkiller(), val, it.get_max_val( "PKILL", reduced ), 0 ) );
1463 }
1464 }
1465
1466 // Handle coughing
1467 mod = 1;
1468 val = 0;
1469 if( it.activated( calendar::turn, "COUGH", val, reduced, mod ) ) {
1470 cough( it.get_harmful_cough() );
1471 }
1472
1473 // Handle vomiting
1474 mod = vomit_mod();
1475 val = 0;
1476 if( it.activated( calendar::turn, "VOMIT", val, reduced, mod ) ) {
1477 vomit();
1478 }
1479
1480 // Handle stamina
1481 val = get_effect( "STAMINA", reduced );
1482 if( val != 0 ) {
1483 mod = 1;
1484 if( is_new || it.activated( calendar::turn, "STAMINA", val, reduced, mod ) ) {
1485 mod_stamina( bound_mod_to_vals( get_stamina(), val,
1486 it.get_max_val( "STAMINA", reduced ),
1487 it.get_min_val( "STAMINA", reduced ) ) );
1488 }
1489 }
1490
1491 // Speed and stats are handled in recalc_speed_bonus and reset_stats respectively
1492}
1493
1494void player::process_effects_internal()
1495{
1496 //Special Removals
1497 if( has_effect( effect_darkness ) && g->is_in_sunlight( pos() ) ) {
1498 remove_effect( effect_darkness );
1499 }
1500 if( has_trait( trait_M_IMMUNE ) && has_effect( effect_fungus ) ) {
1501 vomit();
1502 remove_effect( effect_fungus );
1503 add_msg_if_player( m_bad, _( "We have mistakenly colonized a local guide! Purging now." ) );
1504 }
1505 if( has_trait( trait_PARAIMMUNE ) && ( has_effect( effect_dermatik ) ||
1506 has_effect( effect_tapeworm ) ||
1507 has_effect( effect_bloodworms ) || has_effect( effect_brainworms ) ||
1508 has_effect( effect_paincysts ) ) ) {
1509 remove_effect( effect_dermatik );
1510 remove_effect( effect_tapeworm );
1511 remove_effect( effect_bloodworms );
1512 remove_effect( effect_brainworms );
1513 remove_effect( effect_paincysts );
1514 add_msg_if_player( m_good, _( "Something writhes and inside of you as it dies." ) );
1515 }
1516 if( has_trait( trait_ACIDBLOOD ) && ( has_effect( effect_dermatik ) ||
1517 has_effect( effect_bloodworms ) ||
1518 has_effect( effect_brainworms ) ) ) {
1519 remove_effect( effect_dermatik );
1520 remove_effect( effect_bloodworms );
1521 remove_effect( effect_brainworms );
1522 }
1523 if( has_trait( trait_EATHEALTH ) && has_effect( effect_tapeworm ) ) {
1524 remove_effect( effect_tapeworm );
1525 add_msg_if_player( m_good, _( "Your bowels gurgle as something inside them dies." ) );
1526 }
1527
1528 //Human only effects
1529 for( auto &elem : *effects ) {
1530 for( auto &_effect_it : elem.second ) {
1531 if( !_effect_it.second.is_removed() ) {
1532 process_one_effect( _effect_it.second, false );
1533 }
1534 }
1535 }
1536}
1537
1538double player::vomit_mod()
1539{
1540 double mod = 1;
1541 if( has_effect( effect_weed_high ) ) {
1542 mod *= .1;
1543 }
1544 if( has_trait( trait_STRONGSTOMACH ) ) {
1545 mod *= .5;
1546 }
1547 if( has_trait( trait_WEAKSTOMACH ) ) {
1548 mod *= 2;
1549 }
1550 if( has_trait( trait_NAUSEA ) ) {
1551 mod *= 3;
1552 }
1553 if( has_trait( trait_VOMITOUS ) ) {
1554 mod *= 3;
1555 }
1556 // If you're already nauseous, any food in your stomach greatly
1557 // increases chance of vomiting. Water doesn't provoke vomiting, though.
1558 if( stomach.get_calories() > 0 && has_effect( effect_nausea ) ) {
1559 mod *= 5 * get_effect_int( effect_nausea );
1560 }
1561 return mod;
1562}
1563
1564void player::update_body_wetness( const w_point &weather )
1565{
1566 // Average number of turns to go from completely soaked to fully dry
1567 // assuming average temperature and humidity
1568 constexpr time_duration average_drying = 2_hours;
1569
1570 // A modifier on drying time
1571 double delay = 1.0;
1572 // Weather slows down drying
1573 delay += ( ( weather.humidity - 66 ) - ( units::to_fahrenheit( weather.temperature ) - 65 ) ) / 100;
1574 delay = std::max( 0.1, delay );
1575 // Fur/slime retains moisture
1576 if( has_trait( trait_LIGHTFUR ) || has_trait( trait_FUR ) || has_trait( trait_FELINE_FUR ) ||
1577 has_trait( trait_LUPINE_FUR ) || has_trait( trait_CHITIN_FUR ) || has_trait( trait_CHITIN_FUR2 ) ||
1578 has_trait( trait_CHITIN_FUR3 ) ) {
1579 delay = delay * 6 / 5;
1580 }
1581 if( has_trait( trait_URSINE_FUR ) || has_trait( trait_SLIMY ) ) {
1582 delay *= 1.5;
1583 }
1584
1585 if( !x_in_y( 1, to_turns<int>( average_drying * delay / 100.0 ) ) ) {
1586 // No drying this turn
1587 return;
1588 }
1589
1590 // Now per-body-part stuff
1591 // To make drying uniform, make just one roll and reuse it
1592 const int drying_roll = rng( 1, 80 );
1593
1594 for( const body_part bp : all_body_parts ) {
1595 if( body_wetness[bp] == 0 ) {
1596 continue;
1597 }
1598 // This is to normalize drying times
1599 int drying_chance = drench_capacity[bp];
1600 // Body temperature affects duration of wetness
1601 // Note: Using temp_conv rather than temp_cur, to better approximate environment
1602 if( temp_conv[bp] >= BODYTEMP_SCORCHING ) {
1603 drying_chance *= 2;
1604 } else if( temp_conv[bp] >= BODYTEMP_VERY_HOT ) {
1605 drying_chance = drying_chance * 3 / 2;
1606 } else if( temp_conv[bp] >= BODYTEMP_HOT ) {
1607 drying_chance = drying_chance * 4 / 3;
1608 } else if( temp_conv[bp] > BODYTEMP_COLD ) {
1609 // Comfortable, doesn't need any changes
1610 } else {
1611 // Evaporation doesn't change that much at lower temp
1612 drying_chance = drying_chance * 3 / 4;
1613 }
1614
1615 if( drying_chance < 1 ) {
1616 drying_chance = 1;
1617 }
1618
1619 // TODO: Make evaporation reduce body heat
1620 if( drying_chance >= drying_roll ) {
1621 body_wetness[bp] -= 1;
1622 if( body_wetness[bp] < 0 ) {
1623 body_wetness[bp] = 0;
1624 }
1625 }
1626 }
1627 // TODO: Make clothing slow down drying
1628}

1632 morale->on_worn_item_transform( old_it, new_it );

1634
1635void player::process_items()
1636{
1637 if( weapon.needs_processing() && weapon.process( this, pos(), false ) ) {
1638 weapon = item();
1639 }
1640
1641 std::vector<item *> inv_active = inv.active_items();
1642 for( item *tmp_it : inv_active ) {
1643 if( tmp_it->process( this, pos(), false ) ) {
1644 inv.remove_item( tmp_it );
1645 }
1646 }
1647
1648 // worn items
1649 remove_worn_items_with( [this]( item & itm ) {
1650 return itm.needs_processing() && itm.process( this, pos(), false );
1651 } );
1652
1653 // Active item processing done, now we're recharging.
1654 std::vector<item *> active_worn_items;
1655 bool weapon_active = weapon.has_flag( "USE_UPS" ) &&
1656 weapon.charges < weapon.type->maximum_charges();
1657 std::vector<size_t> active_held_items;
1658 int ch_UPS = 0;
1659 for( size_t index = 0; index < inv.size(); index++ ) {
1660 item &it = inv.find_item( index );
1661 itype_id identifier = it.type->get_id();
1662 if( identifier == itype_UPS_off ) {
1663 ch_UPS += it.ammo_remaining();
1664 } else if( identifier == itype_adv_UPS_off ) {
1665 ch_UPS += it.ammo_remaining() / 0.6;
1666 }
1667 if( it.has_flag( "USE_UPS" ) && it.charges < it.type->maximum_charges() ) {
1668 active_held_items.push_back( index );
1669 }
1670 }
1671 bool update_required = get_check_encumbrance();
1672 for( item &w : worn ) {
1673 if( w.has_flag( "USE_UPS" ) &&
1674 w.charges < w.type->maximum_charges() ) {
1675 active_worn_items.push_back( &w );
1676 }
1677 // Necessary for UPS in Aftershock - check worn items for charge
1678 const itype_id &identifier = w.typeId();
1679 if( identifier == itype_UPS_off ) {
1680 ch_UPS += w.ammo_remaining();
1681 } else if( identifier == itype_adv_UPS_off ) {
1682 ch_UPS += w.ammo_remaining() / 0.6;
1683 }
1684 if( !update_required && w.encumbrance_update_ ) {
1685 update_required = true;
1686 }
1687 w.encumbrance_update_ = false;
1688 }
1689 if( update_required ) {
1690 reset_encumbrance();
1691 }
1692 if( has_active_bionic( bionic_id( "bio_ups" ) ) ) {
1693 ch_UPS += units::to_kilojoule( get_power_level() );
1694 }
1695 int ch_UPS_used = 0;
1696
1697 // Load all items that use the UPS to their minimal functional charge,
1698 // The tool is not really useful if its charges are below charges_to_use
1699 for( size_t index : active_held_items ) {
1700 if( ch_UPS_used >= ch_UPS ) {
1701 break;
1702 }
1703 item &it = inv.find_item( index );
1704 ch_UPS_used++;
1705 it.charges++;
1706 }
1707 if( weapon_active && ch_UPS_used < ch_UPS ) {
1708 ch_UPS_used++;
1709 weapon.charges++;
1710 }
1711 for( item *worn_item : active_worn_items ) {
1712 if( ch_UPS_used >= ch_UPS ) {
1713 break;
1714 }
1715 ch_UPS_used++;
1716 worn_item->charges++;
1717 }
1718 if( ch_UPS_used > 0 ) {
1719 use_charges( itype_UPS, ch_UPS_used );
1720 }
1721}
1722
1723item player::reduce_charges( int position, int quantity )
1724{
1725 item &it = i_at( position );
1726 if( it.is_null() ) {
1727 debugmsg( "invalid item position %d for reduce_charges", position );
1728 return item();
1729 }
1730 if( it.charges <= quantity ) {
1731 return i_rem( position );
1732 }
1733 it.mod_charges( -quantity );
1734 item tmp( it );
1735 tmp.charges = quantity;
1736 return tmp;
1737}
1738
1739item player::reduce_charges( item *it, int quantity )
1740{
1741 if( !has_item( *it ) ) {
1742 debugmsg( "invalid item (name %s) for reduce_charges", it->tname() );
1743 return item();
1744 }
1745 if( it->charges <= quantity ) {
1746 return i_rem( it );
1747 }
1748 it->mod_charges( -quantity );
1749 item result( *it );
1750 result.charges = quantity;
1751 return result;
1752}

1759 } );
1760 return okay;

1768//Returns the amount of charges that were consumed by the player
1769int player::drink_from_hands( item &water )
1770{
1771 int charges_consumed = 0;
1772 if( query_yn( _( "Drink %s from your hands?" ),
1773 colorize( water.type_name(), water.color_in_inventory() ) ) ) {
1774 // Create a dose of water no greater than the amount of water remaining.
1775 item water_temp( water );
1776 // If player is slaked water might not get consumed.
1777 consume_item( water_temp );
1778 charges_consumed = water.charges - water_temp.charges;
1779 if( charges_consumed > 0 ) {
1780 moves -= 350;
1781 }
1782 }
1783
1784 return charges_consumed;
1785}
1786
1787// TODO: Properly split medications and food instead of hacking around
1788bool player::consume_med( item &target )
1789{
1790 if( !target.is_medication() ) {
1791 return false;
1792 }
1793
1794 const itype_id tool_type = target.get_comestible()->tool;
1795 const itype *req_tool = &*tool_type;
1796 bool tool_override = false;
1797 if( tool_type == itype_syringe && has_bionic( bio_syringe ) ) {
1798 tool_override = true;
1799 }
1800 if( req_tool->tool ) {
1801 if( !( has_amount( tool_type, 1 ) && has_charges( tool_type, req_tool->tool->charges_per_use ) ) &&
1802 !tool_override ) {
1803 add_msg_if_player( m_info, _( "You need a %s to consume that!" ), req_tool->nname( 1 ) );
1804 return false;
1805 }
1806 use_charges( tool_type, req_tool->tool->charges_per_use );
1807 }
1808
1809 int amount_used = 1;
1810 if( target.type->has_use() ) {
1811 amount_used = target.type->invoke( *this, target, pos() );
1812 if( amount_used <= 0 ) {
1813 return false;
1814 }
1815 }
1816
1817 // TODO: Get the target it was used on
1818 // Otherwise injecting someone will give us addictions etc.
1819 if( target.has_flag( "NO_INGEST" ) ) {
1820 const auto &comest = *target.get_comestible();
1821 // Assume that parenteral meds don't spoil, so don't apply rot
1822 modify_health( comest );
1823 modify_stimulation( comest );
1824 modify_fatigue( comest );
1825 modify_radiation( comest );
1826 modify_addiction( comest );
1827 modify_morale( target );
1828 } else {
1829 // Take by mouth
1830 consume_effects( target );
1831 }
1832
1833 mod_moves( -250 );
1834 target.charges -= amount_used;
1835 return target.charges <= 0;
1836}
1837
1838static bool query_consume_ownership( item &target, player &p )
1839{
1840 if( !target.is_owned_by( p, true ) ) {
1841 bool choice = true;
1842 if( p.get_value( "THIEF_MODE" ) == "THIEF_ASK" ) {
1843 choice = pickup::query_thief();
1844 }
1845 if( p.get_value( "THIEF_MODE" ) == "THIEF_HONEST" || !choice ) {
1846 return false;
1847 }
1848 std::vector<npc *> witnesses;
1849 for( npc &elem : g->all_npcs() ) {
1850 if( rl_dist( elem.pos(), p.pos() ) < MAX_VIEW_DISTANCE && elem.sees( p.pos() ) ) {
1851 witnesses.push_back( &elem );
1852 }
1853 }
1854 for( npc *elem : witnesses ) {
1855 elem->say( "<witnessed_thievery>", 7 );
1856 }
1857 if( !witnesses.empty() && target.is_owned_by( p, true ) ) {
1858 if( p.add_faction_warning( target.get_owner() ) ) {
1859 for( npc *elem : witnesses ) {
1860 elem->make_angry();
1861 }
1862 }
1863 }
1864 }
1865 return true;
1866}
1867
1868bool player::consume_item( item &target )
1869{
1870 if( target.is_null() ) {
1871 add_msg_if_player( m_info, _( "You do not have that item." ) );
1872 return false;
1873 }
1874 if( is_underwater() && !has_trait( trait_WATERSLEEP ) ) {
1875 add_msg_if_player( m_info, _( "You can't do that while underwater." ) );
1876 return false;
1877 }
1878
1879 item &comest = get_consumable_from( target );
1880
1881 if( comest.is_null() || target.is_craft() ) {
1882 add_msg_if_player( m_info, _( "You can't eat your %s." ), target.tname() );
1883 if( is_npc() ) {
1884 debugmsg( "%s tried to eat a %s", name, target.tname() );
1885 }
1886 return false;
1887 }
1888 if( is_player() && !query_consume_ownership( target, *this ) ) {
1889 return false;
1890 }
1891 if( consume_med( comest ) ||
1892 eat( comest ) || feed_reactor_with( comest ) || feed_furnace_with( comest ) ||
1893 fuel_bionic_with( comest ) ) {
1894
1895 if( target.is_container() ) {
1896 target.on_contents_changed();
1897 }
1898
1899 return comest.charges <= 0;
1900 }
1901
1902 return false;
1903}
1904
1905bool player::consume( item_location loc )
1906{
1907 item &target = *loc;
1908 const bool wielding = is_wielding( target );
1909 const bool worn = is_worn( target );
1910 const bool inv_item = !( wielding || worn );
1911
1912 if( consume_item( target ) ) {
1913
1914 const bool was_in_container = !can_consume_as_is( target );
1915
1916 if( was_in_container ) {
1917 i_rem( &target.contents.front() );
1918 } else {
1919 i_rem( &target );
1920 }
1921
1922 //Restack and sort so that we don't lie about target's invlet
1923 if( inv_item ) {
1924 inv.restack( *this );
1925 }
1926
1927 if( was_in_container && wielding ) {
1928 add_msg_if_player( _( "You are now wielding an empty %s." ), weapon.tname() );
1929 } else if( was_in_container && worn ) {
1930 add_msg_if_player( _( "You are now wearing an empty %s." ), target.tname() );
1931 } else if( was_in_container && !is_npc() ) {
1932 bool drop_it = false;
1933 if( get_option<std::string>( "DROP_EMPTY" ) == "no" ) {
1934 drop_it = false;
1935 } else if( get_option<std::string>( "DROP_EMPTY" ) == "watertight" ) {
1936 drop_it = !target.is_watertight_container();
1937 } else if( get_option<std::string>( "DROP_EMPTY" ) == "all" ) {
1938 drop_it = true;
1939 }
1940 if( drop_it ) {
1941 add_msg( _( "You drop the empty %s." ), target.tname() );
1942 put_into_vehicle_or_drop( *this, item_drop_reason::deliberate, { inv.remove_item( &target ) } );
1943 } else {
1944 int quantity = inv.const_stack( inv.position_by_item( &target ) ).size();
1945 char letter = target.invlet ? target.invlet : ' ';
1946 add_msg( m_info, _( "%c - %d empty %s" ), letter, quantity, target.tname( quantity ) );
1947 }
1948 }
1949 } else if( inv_item ) {
1950 if( pickup::handle_spillable_contents( *this, target, g->m ) ) {
1951 i_rem( &target );
1952 }
1953 inv.restack( *this );
1954 inv.unsort();
1955 }
1956
1957 return true;
1958}
1959
1960bool player::add_faction_warning( const faction_id &id )
1961{
1962 const auto it = warning_record.find( id );
1963 if( it != warning_record.end() ) {
1964 it->second.first += 1;
1965 if( it->second.second - calendar::turn > 5_minutes ) {
1966 it->second.first -= 1;
1967 }
1968 it->second.second = calendar::turn;
1969 if( it->second.first > 3 ) {
1970 return true;
1971 }
1972 } else {
1973 warning_record[id] = std::make_pair( 1, calendar::turn );
1974 }
1975 faction *fac = g->faction_manager_ptr->get( id );
1976 if( fac != nullptr && is_player() && fac->id != faction_id( "no_faction" ) ) {
1977 fac->likes_u -= 1;
1978 fac->respects_u -= 1;
1979 }
1980 return false;
1981}
1982
1983int player::current_warnings_fac( const faction_id &id )
1984{
1985 const auto it = warning_record.find( id );
1986 if( it != warning_record.end() ) {
1987 if( it->second.second - calendar::turn > 5_minutes ) {
1988 it->second.first = std::max( 0,
1989 it->second.first - 1 );
1990 }
1991 return it->second.first;
1992 }
1993 return 0;
1994}
1995
1996bool player::beyond_final_warning( const faction_id &id )
1997{
1998 const auto it = warning_record.find( id );
1999 if( it != warning_record.end() ) {
2000 if( it->second.second - calendar::turn > 5_minutes ) {
2001 it->second.first = std::max( 0,
2002 it->second.first - 1 );
2003 }
2004 return it->second.first > 3;
2005 }
2006 return false;
2007}
2008
2009item::reload_option player::select_ammo( const item &base,
2010 std::vector<item::reload_option> opts ) const
2011{
2012 if( opts.empty() ) {
2013 add_msg_if_player( m_info, _( "Never mind." ) );
2014 return item::reload_option();
2015 }
2016
2017 uilist menu;
2018 menu.text = string_format( base.is_watertight_container() ? _( "Refill %s" ) :
2019 base.has_flag( "RELOAD_AND_SHOOT" ) ? _( "Select ammo for %s" ) : _( "Reload %s" ),
2020 base.tname() );
2021
2022 // Construct item names
2023 std::vector<std::string> names;
2024 std::transform( opts.begin(), opts.end(),
2025 std::back_inserter( names ), [&]( const item::reload_option & e ) {
2026 if( e.ammo->is_magazine() && e.ammo->ammo_data() ) {
2027 if( e.ammo->ammo_current() == itype_battery ) {
2028 // This battery ammo is not a real object that can be recovered but pseudo-object that represents charge
2029 //~ battery storage (charges)
2030 return string_format( pgettext( "magazine", "%1$s (%2$d)" ), e.ammo->type_name(),
2031 e.ammo->ammo_remaining() );
2032 } else {
2033 //~ magazine with ammo (count)
2034 return string_format( pgettext( "magazine", "%1$s with %2$s (%3$d)" ), e.ammo->type_name(),
2035 e.ammo->ammo_data()->nname( e.ammo->ammo_remaining() ), e.ammo->ammo_remaining() );
2036 }
2037 } else if( e.ammo->is_watertight_container() ||
2038 ( e.ammo->is_ammo_container() && is_worn( *e.ammo ) ) ) {
2039 // worn ammo containers should be named by their contents with their location also updated below
2040 return e.ammo->contents.front().display_name();
2041
2042 } else {
2043 const_cast<item_location &>( ammo_location ).make_dirty();
2044 return ( ammo_location && ammo_location == e.ammo ? "* " : "" ) + e.ammo->display_name();
2045 }
2046 } );
2047
2048 // Get location descriptions
2049 std::vector<std::string> where;
2050 std::transform( opts.begin(), opts.end(),
2051 std::back_inserter( where ), [this]( const item::reload_option & e ) {
2052 bool is_ammo_container = e.ammo->is_ammo_container();
2053 if( is_ammo_container || e.ammo->is_container() ) {
2054 if( is_ammo_container && is_worn( *e.ammo ) ) {
2055 return e.ammo->type_name();
2056 }
2057 return string_format( _( "%s, %s" ), e.ammo->type_name(), e.ammo.describe( &g->u ) );
2058 }
2059 return e.ammo.describe( &g->u );
2060 } );
2061
2062 // Pads elements to match longest member and return length
2063 auto pad = []( std::vector<std::string> &vec, int n, int t ) -> int {
2064 for( const auto &e : vec )
2065 {
2066 n = std::max( n, utf8_width( e, true ) + t );
2067 }
2068 for( auto &e : vec )
2069 {
2070 e += std::string( n - utf8_width( e, true ), ' ' );
2071 }
2072 return n;
2073 };
2074
2075 // Pad the first column including 4 trailing spaces
2076 int w = pad( names, utf8_width( menu.text, true ), 6 );
2077 menu.text.insert( 0, 2, ' ' ); // add space for UI hotkeys
2078 menu.text += std::string( w + 2 - utf8_width( menu.text, true ), ' ' );
2079
2080 // Pad the location similarly (excludes leading "| " and trailing " ")
2081 w = pad( where, utf8_width( _( "| Location " ) ) - 3, 6 );
2082 menu.text += _( "| Location " );
2083 menu.text += std::string( w + 3 - utf8_width( _( "| Location " ) ), ' ' );
2084
2085 menu.text += _( "| Amount " );
2086 menu.text += _( "| Moves " );
2087
2088 // We only show ammo statistics for guns and magazines
2089 if( base.is_gun() || base.is_magazine() ) {
2090 menu.text += _( "| Damage | Pierce " );
2091 }
2092
2093 auto draw_row = [&]( int idx ) {
2094 const auto &sel = opts[ idx ];
2095 std::string row = string_format( "%s| %s |", names[ idx ], where[ idx ] );
2096 row += string_format( ( sel.ammo->is_ammo() ||
2097 sel.ammo->is_ammo_container() ) ? " %-7d |" : " |", sel.qty() );
2098 row += string_format( " %-7d ", sel.moves() );
2099
2100 if( base.is_gun() || base.is_magazine() ) {
2101 const itype *ammo = sel.ammo->is_ammo_container() ? sel.ammo->contents.front().ammo_data() :
2102 sel.ammo->ammo_data();
2103 if( ammo ) {
2104 const damage_instance &dam = ammo->ammo->damage;
2105 const damage_unit &du = dam.damage_units.front();
2106 if( du.damage_multiplier != 1.0f ) {
2107 float dam_amt = du.amount;
2108 row += string_format( "| %-3d*%3d%% ", static_cast<int>( dam_amt ),
2109 clamp( static_cast<int>( du.damage_multiplier * 100 ), 0, 999 ) );
2110 } else {
2111 float dam_amt = dam.total_damage();
2112 row += string_format( "| %-8d ", static_cast<int>( dam_amt ) );
2113 }
2114 if( du.res_mult != 1.0f ) {
2115 row += string_format( "| %-3d/%3d%%",
2116 static_cast<int>( du.res_pen ), static_cast<int>( 100 * du.res_mult ) );
2117 } else {
2118 row += string_format( "| %-8d", static_cast<int>( du.res_pen ) );
2119 }
2120 } else {
2121 row += "| | ";
2122 }
2123 }
2124 return row;
2125 };
2126
2127 const ammotype base_ammotype( base.ammo_default().str() );
2128 itype_id last = uistate.lastreload[ base_ammotype ];
2129 // We keep the last key so that pressing the key twice (for example, r-r for reload)
2130 // will always pick the first option on the list.
2131 int last_key = inp_mngr.get_previously_pressed_key();
2132 bool last_key_bound = false;
2133 // This is the entry that has out default
2134 int default_to = 0;
2135
2136 // If last_key is RETURN, don't use that to override hotkey
2137 if( last_key == '\n' ) {
2138 last_key_bound = true;
2139 default_to = -1;
2140 }
2141
2142 for( auto i = 0; i < static_cast<int>( opts.size() ); ++i ) {
2143 const item &ammo = opts[ i ].ammo->is_ammo_container() ? opts[ i ].ammo->contents.front() :
2144 *opts[ i ].ammo;
2145
2146 char hotkey = -1;
2147 if( has_item( ammo ) ) {
2148 // if ammo in player possession and either it or any container has a valid invlet use this
2149 if( ammo.invlet ) {
2150 hotkey = ammo.invlet;
2151 } else {
2152 for( const auto obj : parents( ammo ) ) {
2153 if( obj->invlet ) {
2154 hotkey = obj->invlet;
2155 break;
2156 }
2157 }
2158 }
2159 }
2160 if( last == ammo.typeId() ) {
2161 if( !last_key_bound && hotkey == -1 ) {
2162 // If this is the first occurrence of the most recently used type of ammo and the hotkey
2163 // was not already set above then set it to the keypress that opened this prompt
2164 hotkey = last_key;
2165 last_key_bound = true;
2166 }
2167 if( !last_key_bound ) {
2168 // Pressing the last key defaults to the first entry of compatible type
2169 default_to = i;
2170 last_key_bound = true;
2171 }
2172 }
2173 if( hotkey == last_key ) {
2174 last_key_bound = true;
2175 // Prevent the default from being used: key is bound to something already
2176 default_to = -1;
2177 }
2178
2179 menu.addentry( i, true, hotkey, draw_row( i ) );
2180 }
2181
2182 struct reload_callback : public uilist_callback {
2183 public:
2184 std::vector<item::reload_option> &opts;
2185 const std::function<std::string( int )> draw_row;
2186 int last_key;
2187 const int default_to;
2188 const bool can_partial_reload;
2189
2190 reload_callback( std::vector<item::reload_option> &_opts,
2191 std::function<std::string( int )> _draw_row,
2192 int _last_key, int _default_to, bool _can_partial_reload ) :
2193 opts( _opts ), draw_row( _draw_row ),
2194 last_key( _last_key ), default_to( _default_to ),
2195 can_partial_reload( _can_partial_reload )
2196 {}
2197
2198 bool key( const input_context &, const input_event &event, int idx, uilist *menu ) override {
2199 auto cur_key = event.get_first_input();
2200 if( default_to != -1 && cur_key == last_key ) {
2201 // Select the first entry on the list
2202 menu->ret = default_to;
2203 return true;
2204 }
2205 if( idx < 0 || idx >= static_cast<int>( opts.size() ) ) {
2206 return false;
2207 }
2208 auto &sel = opts[ idx ];
2209 switch( cur_key ) {
2210 case KEY_LEFT:
2211 if( can_partial_reload ) {
2212 sel.qty( sel.qty() - 1 );
2213 menu->entries[ idx ].txt = draw_row( idx );
2214 }
2215 return true;
2216
2217 case KEY_RIGHT:
2218 if( can_partial_reload ) {
2219 sel.qty( sel.qty() + 1 );
2220 menu->entries[ idx ].txt = draw_row( idx );
2221 }
2222 return true;
2223 }
2224 return false;
2225 }
2226 } cb( opts, draw_row, last_key, default_to, !base.has_flag( "RELOAD_ONE" ) );
2227 menu.callback = &cb;
2228
2229 menu.query();
2230 if( menu.ret < 0 || static_cast<size_t>( menu.ret ) >= opts.size() ) {
2231 add_msg_if_player( m_info, _( "Never mind." ) );
2232 return item::reload_option();
2233 }
2234
2235 const item_location &sel = opts[ menu.ret ].ammo;
2236 uistate.lastreload[ ammotype( base.ammo_default().str() ) ] = sel->is_ammo_container() ?
2237 sel->contents.front().typeId() :
2238 sel->typeId();
2239 return opts[ menu.ret ];
2240}
2241
2242bool player::list_ammo( const item &base, std::vector<item::reload_option> &ammo_list,
2243 bool include_empty_mags, bool include_potential ) const
2244{
2245 auto opts = base.gunmods();
2246 opts.push_back( &base );
2247
2248 if( base.magazine_current() ) {
2249 opts.push_back( base.magazine_current() );
2250 }
2251
2252 for( const auto mod : base.gunmods() ) {
2253 if( mod->magazine_current() ) {
2254 opts.push_back( mod->magazine_current() );
2255 }
2256 }
2257
2258 bool ammo_match_found = false;
2259 int ammo_search_range = is_mounted() ? -1 : 1;
2260 for( const auto e : opts ) {
2261 for( const item_location &ammo : find_ammo( *e, include_empty_mags, ammo_search_range ) ) {
2262 // don't try to unload frozen liquids
2263 if( ammo->is_watertight_container() && ammo->contents_made_of( SOLID ) ) {
2264 continue;
2265 }
2266 auto id = ( ammo->is_ammo_container() || ammo->is_container() )
2267 ? ammo->contents.front().typeId()
2268 : ammo->typeId();
2269 const bool can_reload_with = e->can_reload_with( id );
2270 if( can_reload_with ) {
2271 // Speedloaders require an empty target.
2272 if( include_potential || !ammo->has_flag( "SPEEDLOADER" ) || e->ammo_remaining() < 1 ) {
2273 ammo_match_found = true;
2274 }
2275 }
2276 if( ( include_potential && can_reload_with )
2277 || can_reload( *e, id ) || e->has_flag( "RELOAD_AND_SHOOT" ) ) {
2278 ammo_list.emplace_back( this, e, &base, ammo );
2279 }
2280 }
2281 }
2282 return ammo_match_found;
2283}
2284
2285item::reload_option player::select_ammo( const item &base, bool prompt,
2286 bool include_empty_mags, bool include_potential ) const
2287{
2288 std::vector<item::reload_option> ammo_list;
2289 const bool ammo_match_found = list_ammo( base, ammo_list, include_empty_mags, include_potential );
2290
2291 if( ammo_list.empty() ) {
2292 if( !is_npc() ) {
2293 if( !base.is_magazine() && !base.magazine_integral() && !base.magazine_current() ) {
2294 add_msg_if_player( m_info, _( "You need a compatible magazine to reload the %s!" ),
2295 base.tname() );
2296
2297 } else if( ammo_match_found ) {
2298 add_msg_if_player( m_info, _( "Nothing to reload!" ) );
2299 } else {
2300 std::string name;
2301 if( base.ammo_data() ) {
2302 name = base.ammo_data()->nname( 1 );
2303 } else if( base.is_watertight_container() ) {
2304 name = base.is_container_empty() ? "liquid" : base.contents.front().tname();
2305 } else {
2306 name = enumerate_as_string( base.ammo_types().begin(),
2307 base.ammo_types().end(), []( const ammotype & at ) {
2308 return at->name();
2309 }, enumeration_conjunction::none );
2310 }
2311 add_msg_if_player( m_info, _( "You don't have any %s to reload your %s!" ),
2312 name, base.tname() );
2313 }
2314 }
2315 return item::reload_option();
2316 }
2317
2318 // sort in order of move cost (ascending), then remaining ammo (descending) with empty magazines always last
2319 std::stable_sort( ammo_list.begin(), ammo_list.end(), []( const item::reload_option & lhs,
2320 const item::reload_option & rhs ) {
2321 return lhs.ammo->ammo_remaining() > rhs.ammo->ammo_remaining();
2322 } );
2323 std::stable_sort( ammo_list.begin(), ammo_list.end(), []( const item::reload_option & lhs,
2324 const item::reload_option & rhs ) {
2325 return lhs.moves() < rhs.moves();
2326 } );
2327 std::stable_sort( ammo_list.begin(), ammo_list.end(), []( const item::reload_option & lhs,
2328 const item::reload_option & rhs ) {
2329 return ( lhs.ammo->ammo_remaining() != 0 ) > ( rhs.ammo->ammo_remaining() != 0 );
2330 } );
2331
2332 if( is_npc() ) {
2333 return ammo_list[ 0 ];
2334 }
2335
2336 if( !prompt && ammo_list.size() == 1 ) {
2337 // unconditionally suppress the prompt if there's only one option
2338 return ammo_list[ 0 ];
2339 }
2340
2341 return select_ammo( base, std::move( ammo_list ) );
2342}
2343
2344ret_val<bool> player::can_wield( const item &it ) const
2345{
2346 if( it.made_of( LIQUID ) ) {
2347 return ret_val<bool>::make_failure( _( "Can't wield spilt liquids." ) );
2348 }
2349
2350 if( get_working_arm_count() <= 0 ) {
2351 return ret_val<bool>::make_failure(
2352 _( "You need at least one arm to even consider wielding something." ) );
2353 }
2354
2355 if( is_armed() && weapon.has_flag( "NO_UNWIELD" ) ) {
2356 return ret_val<bool>::make_failure( _( "The %s is preventing you from wielding the %s." ),
2357 weapname(), it.tname() );
2358 }
2359
2360 monster *mount = mounted_creature.get();
2361 if( it.is_two_handed( *this ) && ( !has_two_arms() || worn_with_flag( flag_RESTRICT_HAND ) ) &&
2362 !( is_mounted() && mount->has_flag( MF_RIDEABLE_MECH ) &&
2363 mount->type->mech_weapon && it.typeId() == mount->type->mech_weapon ) ) {
2364 if( worn_with_flag( flag_RESTRICT_HAND ) ) {
2365 return ret_val<bool>::make_failure(
2366 _( "Something you are wearing hinders the use of both hands." ) );
2367 } else if( it.has_flag( "ALWAYS_TWOHAND" ) ) {
2368 return ret_val<bool>::make_failure( _( "The %s can't be wielded with only one arm." ),
2369 it.tname() );
2370 } else {
2371 return ret_val<bool>::make_failure( _( "You are too weak to wield %s with only one arm." ),
2372 it.tname() );
2373 }
2374 }
2375 if( is_mounted() && mount->has_flag( MF_RIDEABLE_MECH ) &&
2376 mount->type->mech_weapon && it.typeId() != mount->type->mech_weapon ) {
2377 return ret_val<bool>::make_failure( _( "You cannot wield anything while piloting a mech." ) );
2378 }
2379
2380 return ret_val<bool>::make_success();
2381}
2382
2383bool player::unwield()
2384{
2385 if( weapon.is_null() ) {
2386 return true;
2387 }
2388
2389 if( !can_unwield( weapon ).success() ) {
2390 return false;
2391 }
2392
2393 const std::string query = string_format( _( "Stop wielding %s?" ), weapon.tname() );
2394
2395 if( !dispose_item( item_location( *this, &weapon ), query ) ) {
2396 return false;
2397 }
2398
2399 inv.unsort();
2400
2401 return true;
2402}

2426
2427bool character_martial_arts::pick_style( const avatar &you ) // Style selection menu
2428{
2429 enum style_selection {
2430 KEEP_HANDS_FREE = 0,
2431 STYLE_OFFSET
2432 };
2433
2434 // If there are style already, cursor starts there
2435 // if no selected styles, cursor starts from no-style
2436
2437 // Any other keys quit the menu
2438 const std::vector<matype_id> &selectable_styles = you.has_active_bionic(
2439 bio_cqb ) ? bio_cqb_styles :
2440 ma_styles;
2441
2442 input_context ctxt( "MELEE_STYLE_PICKER" );
2443 ctxt.register_action( "SHOW_DESCRIPTION" );
2444
2445 uilist kmenu;
2446 kmenu.text = string_format( _( "Select a style.\n"
2447 "\n"
2448 "STR: <color_white>%d</color>, DEX: <color_white>%d</color>, "
2449 "PER: <color_white>%d</color>, INT: <color_white>%d</color>\n"
2450 "Press [<color_yellow>%s</color>] for more info.\n" ),
2451 you.get_str(), you.get_dex(), you.get_per(), you.get_int(),
2452 ctxt.get_desc( "SHOW_DESCRIPTION" ) );
2453 ma_style_callback callback( static_cast<size_t>( STYLE_OFFSET ), selectable_styles );
2454 kmenu.callback = &callback;
2455 kmenu.input_category = "MELEE_STYLE_PICKER";
2456 kmenu.additional_actions.emplace_back( "SHOW_DESCRIPTION", translation() );
2457 kmenu.desc_enabled = true;
2458 kmenu.addentry_desc( KEEP_HANDS_FREE, true, 'h',
2459 keep_hands_free ? _( "Keep hands free (on)" ) : _( "Keep hands free (off)" ),
2460 _( "When this is enabled, player won't wield things unless explicitly told to." ) );
2461
2462 kmenu.selected = STYLE_OFFSET;
2463
2464 for( size_t i = 0; i < selectable_styles.size(); i++ ) {
2465 auto &style = selectable_styles[i].obj();
2466 //Check if this style is currently selected
2467 const bool selected = selectable_styles[i] == style_selected;
2468 std::string entry_text = style.name.translated();
2469 if( selected ) {
2470 kmenu.selected = i + STYLE_OFFSET;
2471 entry_text = colorize( entry_text, c_pink );
2472 }
2473 kmenu.addentry_desc( i + STYLE_OFFSET, true, -1, entry_text, style.description.translated() );
2474 }
2475
2476 kmenu.query();
2477 int selection = kmenu.ret;
2478
2479 if( selection >= STYLE_OFFSET ) {
2480 style_selected = selectable_styles[selection - STYLE_OFFSET];
2481 martialart_use_message( you );
2482 } else if( selection == KEEP_HANDS_FREE ) {
2483 keep_hands_free = !keep_hands_free;
2484 } else {
2485 return false;
2486 }
2487
2488 return true;
2489}

2491bool player::can_reload( const item &it, const itype_id &ammo ) const
2492{
2493 if( !it.is_reloadable_with( ammo ) ) {
2494 return false;
2495 }

2498 const auto &linkage = it.type->magazine->linkage;
2499 if( linkage && !has_charges( *linkage, 1 ) ) {
2500 return false;
2501 }
