2506
2507void player::mend_item( item_location &&obj, bool interactive )
2508{
2509 if( has_trait( trait_DEBUG_HS ) ) {
2510 uilist menu;
2511 menu.text = _( "Toggle which fault?" );
2512 std::vector<std::pair<fault_id, bool>> opts;
2513 for( const auto &f : obj->faults_potential() ) {
2514 opts.emplace_back( f, !!obj->faults.count( f ) );
2515 menu.addentry( -1, true, -1, string_format(
2516 opts.back().second ? pgettext( "fault", "Mend: %s" ) : pgettext( "fault", "Set: %s" ),
2517 f.obj().name() ) );
2518 }
2519 if( opts.empty() ) {
2520 add_msg( m_info, _( "The %s doesn't have any faults to toggle." ), obj->tname() );
2521 return;
2522 }
2523 menu.query();
2524 if( menu.ret >= 0 ) {
2525 if( opts[ menu.ret ].second ) {
2526 obj->faults.erase( opts[ menu.ret ].first );
2527 } else {
2528 obj->faults.insert( opts[ menu.ret ].first );
2529 }
2530 }
2531 return;
2532 }
2533
2534 auto inv = crafting_inventory();
2535
2536 struct mending_option {
2537 fault_id fault;
2538 std::reference_wrapper<const mending_method> method;
2539 bool doable;
2540 };
2541
2542 std::vector<mending_option> mending_options;
2543 for( const fault_id &f : obj->faults ) {
2544 for( const auto &m : f->mending_methods() ) {
2545 mending_option opt { f, m.second, true };
2546 for( const auto &sk : m.second.skills ) {
2547 if( get_skill_level( sk.first ) < sk.second ) {
2548 opt.doable = false;
2549 break;
2550 }
2551 }
2552 opt.doable = opt.doable &&
2553 m.second.requirements->can_make_with_inventory( inv, is_crafting_component );
2554 mending_options.emplace_back( opt );
2555 }
2556 }
2557
2558 if( mending_options.empty() ) {
2559 if( interactive ) {
2560 add_msg( m_info, _( "The %s doesn't have any faults to mend." ), obj->tname() );
2561 if( obj->damage() > 0 ) {
2562 const std::set<itype_id> &rep = obj->repaired_with();
2563 if( !rep.empty() ) {
2564 const std::string repair_options =
2565 enumerate_as_string( rep.begin(), rep.end(), []( const itype_id & e ) {
2566 return item::nname( e );
2567 }, enumeration_conjunction::or_ );
2568
2569 add_msg( m_info, _( "It is damaged, and could be repaired with %s. "
2570 "%s to use one of those items." ),
2571 repair_options, press_x( ACTION_USE ) );
2572 }
2573 }
2574 }
2575 return;
2576 }
2577
2578 int sel = 0;
2579 if( interactive ) {
2580 uilist menu;
2581 menu.text = _( "Mend which fault?" );
2582 menu.desc_enabled = true;
2583 menu.desc_lines_hint = 0; // Let uilist handle description height
2584
2585 constexpr int fold_width = 80;
2586
2587 for( const mending_option &opt : mending_options ) {
2588 const mending_method &method = opt.method;
2589 const nc_color col = opt.doable ? c_white : c_light_gray;
2590
2591 auto reqs = method.requirements.obj();
2592 auto tools = reqs.get_folded_tools_list( fold_width, col, inv );
2593 auto comps = reqs.get_folded_components_list( fold_width, col, inv, is_crafting_component );
2594
2595 std::string descr;
2596 if( method.turns_into ) {
2597 descr += string_format( _( "Turns into: <color_cyan>%s</color>\n" ),
2598 method.turns_into->obj().name() );
2599 }
2600 if( method.also_mends ) {
2601 descr += string_format( _( "Also mends: <color_cyan>%s</color>\n" ),
2602 method.also_mends->obj().name() );
2603 }
2604 descr += string_format( _( "Time required: <color_cyan>%s</color>\n" ),
2605 to_string_approx( method.time ) );
2606 if( method.skills.empty() ) {
2607 descr += string_format( _( "Skills: <color_cyan>none</color>\n" ) );
2608 } else {
2609 descr += string_format( _( "Skills: %s\n" ),
2610 enumerate_as_string( method.skills.begin(), method.skills.end(),
2611 [this]( const std::pair<skill_id, int> &sk ) -> std::string {
2612 if( get_skill_level( sk.first ) >= sk.second )
2613 {
2614 return string_format( pgettext( "skill requirement",
2615 //~ %1$s: skill name, %2$s: current skill level, %3$s: required skill level
2616 "<color_cyan>%1$s</color> <color_green>(%2$d/%3$d)</color>" ),
2617 sk.first->name(), get_skill_level( sk.first ), sk.second );
2618 } else
2619 {
2620 return string_format( pgettext( "skill requirement",
2621 //~ %1$s: skill name, %2$s: current skill level, %3$s: required skill level
2622 "<color_cyan>%1$s</color> <color_yellow>(%2$d/%3$d)</color>" ),
2623 sk.first->name(), get_skill_level( sk.first ), sk.second );
2624 }
2625 } ) );
2626 }
2627
2628 for( const std::string &line : tools ) {
2629 descr += line + "\n";
2630 }
2631 for( const std::string &line : comps ) {
2632 descr += line + "\n";
2633 }
2634
2635 const std::string desc = method.description + "\n\n" + colorize( descr, col );
2636 menu.addentry_desc( -1, true, -1, method.name.translated(), desc );
2637 }
2638 menu.query();
2639 if( menu.ret < 0 ) {
2640 add_msg( _( "Never mind." ) );
2641 return;
2642 }
2643 sel = menu.ret;
2644 }
2645
2646 if( sel >= 0 ) {
2647 const mending_option &opt = mending_options[sel];
2648 if( !opt.doable ) {
2649 if( interactive ) {
2650 add_msg( m_info, _( "You are currently unable to mend the %s this way." ), obj->tname() );
2651 }
2652 return;
2653 }
2654
2655 const mending_method &method = opt.method;
2656 assign_activity( activity_id( "ACT_MEND_ITEM" ), to_moves<int>( method.time ) );
2657 activity.name = opt.fault.str();
2658 activity.str_values.emplace_back( method.id );
2659 activity.targets.push_back( std::move( obj ) );
2660 }
2661}
2662
2663int player::item_reload_cost( const item &it, const item &ammo, int qty ) const
2664{
2665 if( ammo.is_ammo() ) {
2666 qty = std::max( std::min( ammo.charges, qty ), 1 );
2667 } else if( ammo.is_ammo_container() || ammo.is_container() ) {
2668 qty = clamp( qty, ammo.contents.front().charges, 1 );
2669 } else if( ammo.is_magazine() ) {
2670 qty = 1;
2671 } else {
2672 debugmsg( "cannot determine reload cost as %s is neither ammo or magazine", ammo.tname() );
2673 return 0;
2674 }
2675
2676 // If necessary create duplicate with appropriate number of charges
2677 item obj = ammo;
2678 obj = obj.split( qty );
2679 if( obj.is_null() ) {
2680 obj = ammo;
2681 }
2682 // No base cost for handling ammo - that's already included in obtain cost
2683 // We have the ammo in our hands right now
2684 int mv = item_handling_cost( obj, true, 0 );
2685
2686 if( ammo.has_flag( "MAG_BULKY" ) ) {
2687 mv *= 1.5; // bulky magazines take longer to insert
2688 }
2689
2690 if( !it.is_gun() && !it.is_magazine() ) {
2691 return mv + 100; // reload a tool or sealable container
2692 }
2693
2694 /** @EFFECT_GUN decreases the time taken to reload a magazine */
2695 /** @EFFECT_PISTOL decreases time taken to reload a pistol */
2696 /** @EFFECT_SMG decreases time taken to reload an SMG */
2697 /** @EFFECT_RIFLE decreases time taken to reload a rifle */
2698 /** @EFFECT_SHOTGUN decreases time taken to reload a shotgun */
2699 /** @EFFECT_LAUNCHER decreases time taken to reload a launcher */
2700
2701 int cost = ( it.is_gun() ? it.get_reload_time() : it.type->magazine->reload_time ) * qty;
2702
2703 skill_id sk = it.is_gun() ? it.type->gun->skill_used : skill_gun;
2704 mv += cost / ( 1.0f + std::min( get_skill_level( sk ) * 0.1f, 1.0f ) );
2705
2706 if( it.has_flag( "STR_RELOAD" ) ) {
2707 /** @EFFECT_STR reduces reload time of some weapons */
2708 mv -= get_str() * 20;
2709 }
2710
2711 return std::max( mv, 25 );
2712}
2713
2714cata::optional<std::list<item>::iterator>
2715player::wear( int pos, bool interactive )
2716{
2717 return wear( i_at( pos ), interactive );
2718}
2719
2720cata::optional<std::list<item>::iterator>
2721player::wear( item &to_wear, bool interactive )
2722{
2723 if( is_worn( to_wear ) ) {
2724 if( interactive ) {
2725 add_msg_player_or_npc( m_info,
2726 _( "You are already wearing that." ),
2727 _( "<npcname> is already wearing that." )
2728 );
2729 }
2730 return cata::nullopt;
2731 }
2732 if( to_wear.is_null() ) {
2733 if( interactive ) {
2734 add_msg_player_or_npc( m_info,
2735 _( "You don't have that item." ),
2736 _( "<npcname> doesn't have that item." ) );
2737 }
2738 return cata::nullopt;
2739 }
2740
2741 bool was_weapon;
2742 item to_wear_copy( to_wear );
2743 if( &to_wear == &weapon ) {
2744 weapon = item();
2745 was_weapon = true;
2746 } else {
2747 inv.remove_item( &to_wear );
2748 inv.restack( *this );
2749 was_weapon = false;
2750 }
2751
2752 auto result = wear_item( to_wear_copy, interactive );
2753 if( !result ) {
2754 if( was_weapon ) {
2755 weapon = to_wear_copy;
2756 } else {
2757 inv.add_item( to_wear_copy, true );
2758 }
2759 return cata::nullopt;
2760 }
2761
2762 return result;
2763}
2764
2765bool player::can_lift( int lift_strength_required ) const
2766{
2767 // avoid comparing by weight as different objects use differing scales (grams vs kilograms etc)
2768 int str = get_str();
2769 if( mounted_creature ) {
2770 auto mons = mounted_creature.get();
2771 str = mons->mech_str_addition() == 0 ? str : mons->mech_str_addition();
2772 }
2773 const int npc_str = get_lift_assist();
2774 if( has_trait( trait_id( "STRONGBACK" ) ) ) {
2775 str *= 1.35;
2776 } else if( has_trait( trait_id( "BADBACK" ) ) ) {
2777 str /= 1.35;
2778 }
2779 return str + npc_str >= lift_strength_required;
2780}
2781
2782ret_val<bool> player::can_takeoff( const item &it, const std::list<item> *res ) const
2783{
2784 auto iter = std::find_if( worn.begin(), worn.end(), [ &it ]( const item & wit ) {
2785 return &it == &wit;
2786 } );
2787
2788 if( iter == worn.end() ) {
2789 return ret_val<bool>::make_failure( !is_npc() ? _( "You are not wearing that item." ) :
2790 _( "<npcname> is not wearing that item." ) );
2791 }
2792
2793 if( res == nullptr && !get_dependent_worn_items( it ).empty() ) {
2794 return ret_val<bool>::make_failure( !is_npc() ?
2795 _( "You can't take off power armor while wearing other power armor components." ) :
2796 _( "<npcname> can't take off power armor while wearing other power armor components." ) );
2797 }
2798 if( it.has_flag( "NO_TAKEOFF" ) ) {
2799 return ret_val<bool>::make_failure( !is_npc() ?
2800 _( "You can't take that item off." ) :
2801 _( "<npcname> can't take that item off." ) );
2802 }
2803 return ret_val<bool>::make_success();
2804}
2805
2806bool player::takeoff( item &it, std::list<item> *res )
2807{
2808 const auto ret = can_takeoff( it, res );
2809 if( !ret.success() ) {
2810 add_msg( m_info, "%s", ret.c_str() );
2811 return false;
2812 }
2813
2814 auto iter = std::find_if( worn.begin(), worn.end(), [ &it ]( const item & wit ) {
2815 return &it == &wit;
2816 } );
2817
2818 if( res == nullptr ) {
2819 if( volume_carried() + it.volume() > volume_capacity_reduced_by( it.get_storage() ) ) {
2820 if( is_npc() || query_yn( _( "No room in inventory for your %s. Drop it?" ),
2821 colorize( it.tname(), it.color_in_inventory() ) ) ) {
2822 item_location loc( *this, &it );
2823 drop( loc, pos() );
2824 return true; // the drop activity ends up taking off the item anyway so shouldn't try to do it again here
2825 } else {
2826 return false;
2827 }
2828 }
2829 iter->on_takeoff( *this );
2830 inv.add_item_keep_invlet( it );
2831 } else {
2832 iter->on_takeoff( *this );
2833 res->push_back( it );
2834 }
2835
2836 add_msg_player_or_npc( _( "You take off your %s." ),
2837 _( "<npcname> takes off their %s." ),
2838 it.tname() );
2839
2840 // TODO: Make this variable
2841 mod_moves( -250 );
2842 worn.erase( iter );
2843
2844 recalc_sight_limits();
2845 reset_encumbrance();
2846
2847 return true;
2848}
2849
2850bool player::takeoff( int pos )
2851{
2852 return takeoff( i_at( pos ) );
2853}
2854
2855bool player::add_or_drop_with_msg( item &it, const bool unloading )
2856{
2857 if( it.made_of( LIQUID ) ) {
2858 liquid_handler::consume_liquid( it, 1 );
2859 return it.charges <= 0;
2860 }
2861 it.charges = this->i_add_to_container( it, unloading );
2862 if( it.is_ammo() && it.charges == 0 ) {
2863 return true;
2864 } else if( !this->can_pick_volume( it ) ) {
2865 put_into_vehicle_or_drop( *this, item_drop_reason::too_large, { it } );
2866 } else if( !this->can_pick_weight( it, !get_option<bool>( "DANGEROUS_PICKUPS" ) ) ) {
2867 put_into_vehicle_or_drop( *this, item_drop_reason::too_heavy, { it } );
2868 } else {
2869 auto &ni = this->i_add( it );
2870 add_msg( _( "You put the %s in your inventory." ), ni.tname() );
2871 add_msg( m_info, "%c - %s", ni.invlet == 0 ? ' ' : ni.invlet, ni.tname() );
2872 }
2873 return true;
2874}
2875
2876bool player::unload( item_location loc )
2877{
2878 item &it = *loc.get_item();
2879 // Unload a container consuming moves per item successfully removed
2880 if( it.is_container() || it.is_bandolier() ) {
2881 if( it.contents.empty() ) {
2882 add_msg( m_info, _( "The %s is already empty!" ), it.tname() );
2883 return false;
2884 }
2885 if( !it.can_unload_liquid() ) {
2886 add_msg( m_info, _( "The liquid can't be unloaded in its current state!" ) );
2887 return false;
2888 }
2889
2890 bool changed = false;
2891 for( item *contained : it.contents.all_items_top() ) {
2892 int old_charges = contained->charges;
2893 const bool consumed = this->add_or_drop_with_msg( *contained, true );
2894 changed = changed || consumed || contained->charges != old_charges;
2895 if( consumed ) {
2896 this->mod_moves( -this->item_handling_cost( *contained ) );
2897 it.remove_item( *contained );
2898 }
2899 }
2900
2901 if( changed ) {
2902 it.on_contents_changed();
2903 }
2904 return true;
2905 }
2906
2907 // If item can be unloaded more than once (currently only guns) prompt user to choose
2908 std::vector<std::string> msgs( 1, it.tname() );
2909 std::vector<item *> opts( 1, &it );
2910
2911 for( auto e : it.gunmods() ) {
2912 if( e->is_gun() && !e->has_flag( "NO_UNLOAD" ) &&
2913 ( e->magazine_current() || e->ammo_remaining() > 0 || e->casings_count() > 0 ) ) {
2914 msgs.emplace_back( e->tname() );
2915 opts.emplace_back( e );
2916 }
2917 }
2918
2919 item *target = nullptr;
2920 if( opts.size() > 1 ) {
2921 const int ret = uilist( _( "Unload what?" ), msgs );
2922 if( ret >= 0 ) {
2923 target = opts[ret];
2924 }
2925 } else {
2926 target = &it;
2927 }
2928
2929 if( target == nullptr ) {
2930 return false;
2931 }
2932
2933 // Next check for any reasons why the item cannot be unloaded
2934 if( target->ammo_types().empty() || target->ammo_capacity() <= 0 ) {
2935 add_msg( m_info, _( "You can't unload a %s!" ), target->tname() );
2936 return false;
2937 }
2938
2939 if( target->has_flag( "NO_UNLOAD" ) ) {
2940 if( target->has_flag( "RECHARGE" ) || target->has_flag( "USE_UPS" ) ) {
2941 add_msg( m_info, _( "You can't unload a rechargeable %s!" ), target->tname() );
2942 } else {
2943 add_msg( m_info, _( "You can't unload a %s!" ), target->tname() );
2944 }
2945 return false;
2946 }
2947
2948 if( !target->magazine_current() && target->ammo_remaining() <= 0 && target->casings_count() <= 0 ) {
2949 if( target->is_tool() ) {
2950 add_msg( m_info, _( "Your %s isn't charged." ), target->tname() );
2951 } else {
2952 add_msg( m_info, _( "Your %s isn't loaded." ), target->tname() );
2953 }
2954 return false;
2955 }
2956
2957 target->casings_handle( [&]( item & e ) {
2958 return this->i_add_or_drop( e );
2959 } );
2960
2961 if( target->is_magazine() ) {
2962 // Calculate the time to remove the contained ammo (consuming half as much time as required to load the magazine)
2963 int mv = 0;
2964 int qty = 0;
2965 std::vector<item *> remove_contained;
2966 for( item *contained : it.contents.all_items_top() ) {
2967 mv += this->item_reload_cost( it, *contained, contained->charges ) / 2;
2968 if( add_or_drop_with_msg( *contained, true ) ) {
2969 qty += contained->charges;
2970 remove_contained.push_back( contained );
2971 }
2972 }
2973 // remove the ammo leads in the belt
2974 for( item *remove : remove_contained ) {
2975 it.remove_item( *remove );
2976 }
2977
2978 // remove the belt linkage
2979 if( it.is_ammo_belt() ) {
2980 if( it.type->magazine->linkage ) {
2981 item link( *it.type->magazine->linkage, calendar::turn, qty );
2982 add_or_drop_with_msg( link, true );
2983 }
2984 add_msg( _( "You disassemble your %s." ), it.tname() );
2985 } else {
2986 add_msg( _( "You unload your %s." ), it.tname() );
2987 }
2988
2989 mod_moves( -std::min( 200, mv ) );
2990 if( loc->has_flag( "MAG_DESTROY" ) && loc->ammo_remaining() == 0 ) {
2991 loc.remove_item();
2992 }
2993 return true;
2994
2995 } else if( target->magazine_current() ) {
2996 if( !this->add_or_drop_with_msg( *target->magazine_current(), true ) ) {
2997 return false;
2998 }
2999 // Eject magazine consuming half as much time as required to insert it
3000 this->moves -= this->item_reload_cost( *target, *target->magazine_current(), -1 ) / 2;
3001
3002 target->remove_items_with( [&target]( const item & e ) {
3003 return target->magazine_current() == &e;
3004 } );
3005
3006 } else if( target->ammo_remaining() ) {
3007 int qty = target->ammo_remaining();
3008
3009 if( target->ammo_current() == itype_plut_cell ) {
3010 qty = target->ammo_remaining() / PLUTONIUM_CHARGES;
3011 if( qty > 0 ) {
3012 add_msg( _( "You recover %i unused plutonium." ), qty );
3013 } else {
3014 add_msg( m_info, _( "You can't remove partially depleted plutonium!" ) );
3015 return false;
3016 }
3017 }
3018
3019 // Construct a new ammo item and try to drop it
3020 item ammo( target->ammo_current(), calendar::turn, qty );
3021 if( target->is_filthy() ) {
3022 ammo.set_flag( "FILTHY" );
3023 }
3024
3025 if( ammo.made_of( LIQUID ) ) {
3026 if( !this->add_or_drop_with_msg( ammo ) ) {
3027 qty -= ammo.charges; // only handled part (or none) of the liquid
3028 }
3029 if( qty <= 0 ) {
3030 return false; // no liquid was moved
3031 }
3032
3033 } else if( !this->add_or_drop_with_msg( ammo, qty > 1 ) ) {
3034 return false;
3035 }
3036
3037 // If successful remove appropriate qty of ammo consuming half as much time as required to load it
3038 this->moves -= this->item_reload_cost( *target, ammo, qty ) / 2;
3039
3040 if( target->ammo_current() == itype_plut_cell ) {
3041 qty *= PLUTONIUM_CHARGES;
3042 }
3043
3044 target->ammo_set( target->ammo_current(), target->ammo_remaining() - qty );
3045 }
3046
3047 // Turn off any active tools
3048 if( target->is_tool() && target->active && target->ammo_remaining() == 0 ) {
3049 target->type->invoke( *this, *target, this->pos() );
3050 }
3051
3052 add_msg( _( "You unload your %s." ), target->tname() );
3053 return true;
3054
3055}

3074 itm.type->can_use( "CATFOOD" ) ||

3078
3079void player::use( item_location loc )
3080{
3081 item &used = *loc.get_item();
3082
3083 if( used.is_null() ) {
3084 add_msg( m_info, _( "You do not have that item." ) );
3085 return;
3086 }
3087
3088 last_item = used.typeId();
3089
3090 if( used.is_tool() ) {
3091 if( !used.type->has_use() ) {
3092 add_msg_if_player( _( "You can't do anything interesting with your %s." ), used.tname() );
3093 return;
3094 }
3095 invoke_item( &used, loc.position() );
3096
3097 } else if( is_pet_food( used ) ) {
3098 invoke_item( &used, loc.position() );
3099
3100 } else if( !used.is_container_empty() && is_pet_food( used.get_contained() ) ) {
3101 unload( loc );
3102
3103 } else if( !used.is_craft() && ( used.is_medication() || ( !used.type->has_use() &&
3104 ( used.is_food() ||
3105 used.get_contained().is_food() ||
3106 used.get_contained().is_medication() ) ) ) ) {
3107 consume( loc );
3108
3109 } else if( used.is_book() ) {
3110 // TODO: Handle this with dynamic dispatch.
3111 if( avatar *u = as_avatar() ) {
3112 u->read( loc );
3113 }
3114 } else if( used.type->has_use() ) {
3115 invoke_item( &used, loc.position() );
3116 } else if( used.has_flag( flag_SPLINT ) ) {
3117 ret_val<bool> need_splint = can_wear( used );
3118 if( need_splint.success() ) {
3119 wear_item( used );
3120 loc.remove_item();
3121 } else {
3122 add_msg( m_info, need_splint.str() );
3123 }
3124 } else {
3125 add_msg( m_info, _( "You can't do anything interesting with your %s." ),
3126 used.tname() );
3127 }
3128 recalculate_enchantment_cache();
3129}
3130
3131void player::reassign_item( item &it, int invlet )
3132{
3133 bool remove_old = true;
3134 if( invlet ) {
3135 item *prev = invlet_to_item( invlet );
3136 if( prev != nullptr ) {
3137 remove_old = it.typeId() != prev->typeId();
3138 inv.reassign_item( *prev, it.invlet, remove_old );
3139 }
3140 }
3141
3142 if( !invlet || inv_chars.valid( invlet ) ) {
3143 const auto iter = inv.assigned_invlet.find( it.invlet );
3144 bool found = iter != inv.assigned_invlet.end();
3145 if( found ) {
3146 inv.assigned_invlet.erase( iter );
3147 }
3148 if( invlet && ( !found || it.invlet != invlet ) ) {
3149 inv.assigned_invlet[invlet] = it.typeId();
3150 }
3151 inv.reassign_item( it, invlet, remove_old );
3152 }
3153}

3155static bool has_mod( const item &gun, const item &mod )
3156{
3157 for( const item *toolmod : gun.gunmods() ) {
3158 if( &mod == toolmod ) {
3159 return true;
3160 }
3161 }
3162 return false;
3163}
3164
3165bool player::gunmod_remove( item &gun, item &mod )
3166{
3167 if( !has_mod( gun, mod ) ) {
3168 debugmsg( "Cannot remove non-existent gunmod" );
3169 return false;
3170 }
3171
3172 item_location loc = item_location( *this, &mod );
3173 if( mod.ammo_remaining() && !unload( loc ) ) {
3174 return false;
3175 }
3176
3177 gun.gun_set_mode( gun_mode_id( "DEFAULT" ) );
3178 //TODO: add activity for removing gunmods
3179
3180 if( mod.typeId() == itype_brass_catcher ) {
3181 gun.casings_handle( [&]( item & e ) {
3182 return i_add_or_drop( e );
3183 } );
3184 }
3185
3186 const itype *modtype = mod.type;
3187
3188 i_add_or_drop( mod );
3189 gun.remove_item( mod );
3190
3191 //If the removed gunmod added mod locations, check to see if any mods are in invalid locations
3192 if( !modtype->gunmod->add_mod.empty() ) {
3193 std::map<gunmod_location, int> mod_locations = gun.get_mod_locations();
3194 for( const auto &slot : mod_locations ) {
3195 int free_slots = gun.get_free_mod_locations( slot.first );
3196
3197 for( auto the_mod : gun.gunmods() ) {
3198 if( the_mod->type->gunmod->location == slot.first && free_slots < 0 ) {
3199 gunmod_remove( gun, *the_mod );
3200 free_slots++;
3201 } else if( mod_locations.find( the_mod->type->gunmod->location ) ==
3202 mod_locations.end() ) {
3203 gunmod_remove( gun, *the_mod );
3204 }
3205 }
3206 }
3207 }
3208
3209 //~ %1$s - gunmod, %2$s - gun.
3210 add_msg_if_player( _( "You remove your %1$s from your %2$s." ), modtype->nname( 1 ),
3211 gun.tname() );
3212
3213 return true;
3214}
3215
3216std::pair<int, int> player::gunmod_installation_odds( const item &gun, const item &mod ) const
3217{
3218 // Mods with INSTALL_DIFFICULT have a chance to fail, potentially damaging the gun
3219 if( !mod.has_flag( "INSTALL_DIFFICULT" ) || has_trait( trait_DEBUG_HS ) ) {
3220 return std::make_pair( 100, 0 );
3221 }
3222
3223 int roll = 100; // chance of success (%)
3224 int risk = 0; // chance of failure (%)
3225 int chances = 1; // start with 1 in 6 (~17% chance)
3226
3227 for( const auto &e : mod.type->min_skills ) {
3228 // gain an additional chance for every level above the minimum requirement
3229 skill_id sk = e.first == skill_weapon ? gun.gun_skill() : e.first;
3230 chances += std::max( get_skill_level( sk ) - e.second, 0 );
3231 }
3232 // cap success from skill alone to 1 in 5 (~83% chance)
3233 roll = std::min( static_cast<double>( chances ), 5.0 ) / 6.0 * 100;
3234 // focus is either a penalty or bonus of at most +/-10%
3235 roll += ( std::min( std::max( focus_pool, 140 ), 60 ) - 100 ) / 4;
3236 // dexterity and intelligence give +/-2% for each point above or below 12
3237 roll += ( get_dex() - 12 ) * 2;
3238 roll += ( get_int() - 12 ) * 2;
3239 // each level of damage to the base gun reduces success by 10%
3240 roll -= std::max( gun.damage_level( 4 ), 0 ) * 10;
3241 roll = std::min( std::max( roll, 0 ), 100 );
3242
3243 // risk of causing damage on failure increases with less durable guns
3244 risk = ( 100 - roll ) * ( ( 10.0 - std::min( gun.type->gun->durability, 9 ) ) / 10.0 );
3245
3246 return std::make_pair( roll, risk );
3247}
3248
3249void player::gunmod_add( item &gun, item &mod )
3250{
3251 if( !gun.is_gunmod_compatible( mod ).success() ) {
3252 debugmsg( "Tried to add incompatible gunmod" );
3253 return;
3254 }
3255
3256 if( !has_item( gun ) && !has_item( mod ) ) {
3257 debugmsg( "Tried gunmod installation but mod/gun not in player possession" );
3258 return;
3259 }
3260
3261 // first check at least the minimum requirements are met
3262 if( !has_trait( trait_DEBUG_HS ) && !can_use( mod, gun ) ) {
3263 return;
3264 }
3265
3266 // any (optional) tool charges that are used during installation
3267 auto odds = gunmod_installation_odds( gun, mod );
3268 int roll = odds.first;
3269 int risk = odds.second;
3270
3271 std::string tool;
3272 int qty = 0;
3273 bool requery = false;
3274
3275 item modded = gun;
3276 modded.put_in( mod );
3277 bool no_magazines = modded.common_ammo_default().is_null();
3278
3279 std::string query_msg = mod.is_irremovable()
3280 ? _( "<color_yellow>Permanently</color> install your %1$s in your %2$s?" )
3281 : _( "Attach your %1$s to your %2$s?" );
3282 if( no_magazines ) {
3283 query_msg += "\n";
3284 query_msg += colorize(
3285 _( "Warning: after installing this mod, a magazine adapter mod will be required to load it!" ),
3286 c_red );
3287 }
3288
3289 uilist prompt;
3290 prompt.text = string_format( query_msg,
3291 colorize( mod.tname(), mod.color_in_inventory() ),
3292 colorize( gun.tname(), gun.color_in_inventory() ) );
3293
3294 std::vector<std::function<void()>> actions;
3295
3296 if( roll < 100 ) {
3297 prompt.addentry( -1, true, 'w',
3298 string_format( _( "Try without tools (%i%%) risking damage (%i%%)" ), roll, risk ) );
3299 actions.emplace_back( [&] {} );
3300
3301 prompt.addentry( -1, has_charges( itype_small_repairkit, 100 ), 'f',
3302 string_format( _( "Use 100 charges of firearm repair kit (%i%%)" ), std::min( roll * 2, 100 ) ) );
3303
3304 actions.emplace_back( [&] {
3305 tool = "small_repairkit";
3306 qty = 100;
3307 roll *= 2; // firearm repair kit improves success...
3308 risk /= 2; // ...and reduces the risk of damage upon failure
3309 } );
3310
3311 prompt.addentry( -1, has_charges( itype_large_repairkit, 25 ), 'g',
3312 string_format( _( "Use 25 charges of gunsmith repair kit (%i%%)" ), std::min( roll * 3, 100 ) ) );
3313
3314 actions.emplace_back( [&] {
3315 tool = "large_repairkit";
3316 qty = 25;
3317 roll *= 3; // gunsmith repair kit improves success markedly...
3318 risk = 0; // ...and entirely prevents damage upon failure
3319 } );
3320 } else {
3321 prompt.addentry( -1, true, 'w', _( "Install without tools" ) );
3322 actions.emplace_back( [&] {} );
3323 }
3324
3325 prompt.addentry( -1, true, 'c', _( "Compare before/after installation" ) );
3326 actions.emplace_back( [&] {
3327 requery = true;
3328 game_menus::inv::compare( gun, modded );
3329 } );
3330
3331 do {
3332 requery = false;
3333 prompt.query();
3334 if( prompt.ret < 0 ) {
3335 add_msg_if_player( _( "Never mind." ) );
3336 return; // player canceled installation
3337 }
3338 actions[ prompt.ret ]();
3339 } while( requery );
3340
3341 const int moves = !has_trait( trait_DEBUG_HS ) ? mod.type->gunmod->install_time : 0;
3342
3343 assign_activity( activity_id( "ACT_GUNMOD_ADD" ), moves, -1, 0, tool );
3344 activity.targets.push_back( item_location( *this, &gun ) );
3345 activity.targets.push_back( item_location( *this, &mod ) );
3346 activity.values.push_back( 0 ); // dummy value
3347 activity.values.push_back( roll ); // chance of success (%)
3348 activity.values.push_back( risk ); // chance of damage (%)
3349 activity.values.push_back( qty ); // tool charges
3350}

3352void player::toolmod_add( item_location tool, item_location mod )
3353{
3354 if( !tool && !mod ) {
3355 debugmsg( "Tried toolmod installation but mod/tool not available" );
3356 return;
3357 }
3358 // first check at least the minimum requirements are met
3359 if( !has_trait( trait_DEBUG_HS ) && !can_use( *mod, *tool ) ) {
3360 return;
3361 }
3362
3363 if( !query_yn( _( "Permanently install your %1$s in your %2$s?" ),
3364 colorize( mod->tname(), mod->color_in_inventory() ),
3365 colorize( tool->tname(), tool->color_in_inventory() ) ) ) {
3366 add_msg_if_player( _( "Never mind." ) );
3367 return; // player canceled installation
3368 }
3369
3370 assign_activity( activity_id( "ACT_TOOLMOD_ADD" ), 1, -1 );
3371 activity.targets.emplace_back( std::move( tool ) );
3372 activity.targets.emplace_back( std::move( mod ) );
3373}

3387
3388recipe_subset player::get_recipes_from_books( const inventory &crafting_inv,
3389 recipe_filter filter ) const
3390{
3391 recipe_subset res;
3392
3393 for( const auto &stack : crafting_inv.const_slice() ) {
3394 const item &candidate = stack->front();
3395
3396 for( std::pair<const recipe *, int> recipe_entry :
3397 candidate.get_available_recipes( *this ) ) {
3398 if( filter && !filter( *recipe_entry.first ) ) {
3399 continue;
3400 }
3401 res.include( recipe_entry.first, recipe_entry.second );
3402 }
3403 }
3404
3405 return res;
3406}
3407
3408recipe_subset player::get_available_recipes( const inventory &crafting_inv,
3409 const std::vector<npc *> *helpers, recipe_filter filter ) const
3410{
3411 recipe_subset res;
3412
3413 if( filter ) {
3414 res.include_if( get_learned_recipes(), filter );
3415 } else {
3416 res.include( get_learned_recipes() );
3417 }
3418
3419 res.include( get_recipes_from_books( crafting_inv, filter ) );
3420
3421 if( helpers != nullptr ) {
3422 for( npc *np : *helpers ) {
3423 // Directly form the helper's inventory
3424 res.include( get_recipes_from_books( np->inv, filter ) );
3425 // Being told what to do
3426 res.include_if( np->get_learned_recipes(), [ this, &filter ]( const recipe & r ) {
3427 if( filter && !filter( r ) ) {
3428 return false;
3429 }
3430 // Skilled enough to understand
3431 return get_skill_level( r.skill_used ) >= static_cast<int>( r.difficulty * 0.8f );
3432 } );
3433 }
3434 }
3435
3436 return res;
3437}
3438
3439void player::try_to_sleep( const time_duration &dur )
3440{
3441 const optional_vpart_position vp = g->m.veh_at( pos() );
3442 const trap &trap_at_pos = g->m.tr_at( pos() );
3443 const ter_id ter_at_pos = g->m.ter( pos() );
3444 const furn_id furn_at_pos = g->m.furn( pos() );
3445 bool plantsleep = false;
3446 bool fungaloid_cosplay = false;
3447 bool websleep = false;
3448 bool webforce = false;
3449 bool websleeping = false;
3450 bool in_shell = false;
3451 bool watersleep = false;
3452 if( has_trait( trait_CHLOROMORPH ) ) {
3453 plantsleep = true;
3454 if( ( ter_at_pos == t_dirt || ter_at_pos == t_pit ||
3455 ter_at_pos == t_dirtmound || ter_at_pos == t_pit_shallow ||
3456 ter_at_pos == t_grass ) && !vp &&
3457 furn_at_pos == f_null ) {
3458 add_msg_if_player( m_good, _( "You relax as your roots embrace the soil." ) );
3459 } else if( vp ) {
3460 add_msg_if_player( m_bad, _( "It's impossible to sleep in this wheeled pot!" ) );
3461 } else if( furn_at_pos != f_null ) {
3462 add_msg_if_player( m_bad,
3463 _( "The humans' furniture blocks your roots. You can't get comfortable." ) );
3464 } else { // Floor problems
3465 add_msg_if_player( m_bad, _( "Your roots scrabble ineffectively at the unyielding surface." ) );
3466 }
3467 } else if( has_trait( trait_M_SKIN3 ) ) {
3468 fungaloid_cosplay = true;
3469 if( g->m.has_flag_ter_or_furn( "FUNGUS", pos() ) ) {
3470 add_msg_if_player( m_good,
3471 _( "Our fibers meld with the ground beneath us. The gills on our neck begin to seed the air with spores as our awareness fades." ) );
3472 }
3473 }
3474 if( has_trait( trait_WEB_WALKER ) ) {
3475 websleep = true;
3476 }
3477 // Not sure how one would get Arachnid w/o web-making, but Just In Case
3478 if( has_trait( trait_THRESH_SPIDER ) && ( has_trait( trait_WEB_SPINNER ) ||
3479 ( has_trait( trait_WEB_WEAVER ) ) ) ) {
3480 webforce = true;
3481 }
3482 if( websleep || webforce ) {
3483 int web = g->m.get_field_intensity( pos(), fd_web );
3484 if( !webforce ) {
3485 // At this point, it's kinda weird, but surprisingly comfy...
3486 if( web >= 3 ) {
3487 add_msg_if_player( m_good,
3488 _( "These thick webs support your weight, and are strangely comfortable" ) );
3489 websleeping = true;
3490 } else if( web > 0 ) {
3491 add_msg_if_player( m_info,
3492 _( "You try to sleep, but the webs get in the way. You brush them aside." ) );
3493 g->m.remove_field( pos(), fd_web );
3494 }
3495 } else {
3496 // Here, you're just not comfortable outside a nice thick web.
3497 if( web >= 3 ) {
3498 add_msg_if_player( m_good, _( "You relax into your web." ) );
3499 websleeping = true;
3500 } else {
3501 add_msg_if_player( m_bad,
3502 _( "You try to sleep, but you feel exposed and your spinnerets keep twitching." ) );
3503 add_msg_if_player( m_info, _( "Maybe a nice thick web would help you sleep." ) );
3504 }
3505 }
3506 }
3507 if( has_active_mutation( trait_SHELL2 ) ) {
3508 // Your shell's interior is a comfortable place to sleep.
3509 in_shell = true;
3510 }
3511 if( has_trait( trait_WATERSLEEP ) ) {
3512 if( underwater ) {
3513 add_msg_if_player( m_good,
3514 _( "You lay beneath the waves' embrace, gazing up through the water's surface" ) );
3515 watersleep = true;
3516 } else if( g->m.has_flag_ter( "SWIMMABLE", pos() ) ) {
3517 add_msg_if_player( m_good, _( "You settle into the water and begin to drowse" ) );
3518 watersleep = true;
3519 }
3520 }
3521 if( !plantsleep && ( furn_at_pos.obj().comfort > static_cast<int>( comfort_level::neutral ) ||
3522 ter_at_pos == t_improvised_shelter ||
3523 trap_at_pos.comfort > static_cast<int>( comfort_level::neutral ) ||
3524 in_shell || websleeping || watersleep ||
3525 vp.part_with_feature( "SEAT", true ) ||
3526 vp.part_with_feature( "BED", true ) ) ) {
3527 add_msg_if_player( m_good, _( "This is a comfortable place to sleep." ) );
3528 } else if( !plantsleep && !fungaloid_cosplay && !watersleep ) {
3529 if( !vp && ter_at_pos != t_floor ) {
3530 add_msg_if_player( ter_at_pos.obj().movecost <= 2 ?
3531 _( "It's a little hard to get to sleep on this %s." ) :
3532 _( "It's hard to get to sleep on this %s." ),
3533 ter_at_pos.obj().name() );
3534 } else if( vp ) {
3535 if( vp->part_with_feature( VPFLAG_AISLE, true ) ) {
3536 add_msg_if_player(
3537 //~ %1$s: vehicle name, %2$s: vehicle part name
3538 _( "It's a little hard to get to sleep on this %2$s in %1$s." ),
3539 vp->vehicle().disp_name(),
3540 vp->part_with_feature( VPFLAG_AISLE, true )->part().name( false ) );
3541 } else {
3542 add_msg_if_player(
3543 //~ %1$s: vehicle name
3544 _( "It's hard to get to sleep in %1$s." ),
3545 vp->vehicle().disp_name() );
3546 }
3547 }
3548 }
3549 add_msg_if_player( _( "You start trying to fall asleep." ) );
3550 if( has_active_bionic( bio_soporific ) ) {
3551 bio_soporific_powered_at_last_sleep_check = has_power();
3552 if( bio_soporific_powered_at_last_sleep_check ) {
3553 // The actual bonus is applied in sleep_spot( p ).
3554 add_msg_if_player( m_good, _( "Your soporific inducer starts working its magic." ) );
3555 } else {
3556 add_msg_if_player( m_bad, _( "Your soporific inducer doesn't have enough power to operate." ) );
3557 }
3558 }
3559 assign_activity( activity_id( "ACT_TRY_SLEEP" ), to_moves<int>( dur ) );
3560}
3561
3562int player::sleep_spot( const tripoint &p ) const
3563{
3564 const int current_stim = get_stim();
3565 const comfort_response_t comfort_info = base_comfort_value( p );
3566 if( comfort_info.aid != nullptr ) {
3567 add_msg_if_player( m_info, _( "You use your %s for comfort." ), comfort_info.aid->tname() );
3568 }
3569
3570 int sleepy = static_cast<int>( comfort_info.level );
3571 bool watersleep = has_trait( trait_WATERSLEEP );
3572
3573 if( has_addiction( add_type::SLEEP ) ) {
3574 sleepy -= 4;
3575 }
3576 if( has_trait( trait_INSOMNIA ) ) {
3577 // 12.5 points is the difference between "tired" and "dead tired"
3578 sleepy -= 12;
3579 }
3580 if( has_trait( trait_EASYSLEEPER ) ) {
3581 // Low fatigue (being rested) has a much stronger effect than high fatigue
3582 // so it's OK for the value to be that much higher
3583 sleepy += 40;
3584 }
3585 if( has_active_bionic( bio_soporific ) ) {
3586 sleepy += 30;
3587 }
3588 if( has_trait( trait_EASYSLEEPER2 ) ) {
3589 // At this point, the only limit to sleep is tiredness
3590 sleepy += 100;
3591 }
3592 if( watersleep && g->m.has_flag_ter( "SWIMMABLE", pos() ) ) {
3593 sleepy += 10; //comfy water!
3594 }
3595
3596 if( get_fatigue() < fatigue_levels::tired + 1 ) {
3597 sleepy -= static_cast<int>( ( fatigue_levels::tired + 1 - get_fatigue() ) / 4 );
3598 } else {
3599 sleepy += static_cast<int>( ( get_fatigue() - fatigue_levels::tired + 1 ) / 16 );
3600 }
3601
3602 if( current_stim > 0 || !has_trait( trait_INSOMNIA ) ) {
3603 sleepy -= 2 * current_stim;
3604 } else {
3605 // Make it harder for insomniac to get around the trait
3606 sleepy -= current_stim;
3607 }
3608
3609 return sleepy;
3610}
3611
3612bool player::can_sleep()
3613{
3614 if( has_effect( effect_meth ) ) {
3615 // Sleep ain't happening until that meth wears off completely.
3616 return false;
3617 }
3618
3619 // Since there's a bit of randomness to falling asleep, we want to
3620 // prevent exploiting this if can_sleep() gets called over and over.
3621 // Only actually check if we can fall asleep no more frequently than
3622 // every 30 minutes. We're assuming that if we return true, we'll
3623 // immediately be falling asleep after that.
3624 //
3625 // Also if player debug menu'd time backwards this breaks, just do the
3626 // check anyway, this will reset the timer if 'dur' is negative.
3627 const time_point now = calendar::turn;
3628 const time_duration dur = now - last_sleep_check;
3629 if( dur >= 0_turns && dur < 30_minutes ) {
3630 return false;
3631 }
3632 last_sleep_check = now;
3633
3634 int sleepy = sleep_spot( pos() );
3635 sleepy += rng( -8, 8 );
3636 bool result = sleepy > 0;
3637
3638 if( has_active_bionic( bio_soporific ) ) {
3639 if( bio_soporific_powered_at_last_sleep_check && !has_power() ) {
3640 add_msg_if_player( m_bad, _( "Your soporific inducer runs out of power!" ) );
3641 } else if( !bio_soporific_powered_at_last_sleep_check && has_power() ) {
3642 add_msg_if_player( m_good, _( "Your soporific inducer starts back up." ) );
3643 }
3644 bio_soporific_powered_at_last_sleep_check = has_power();
3645 }
3646
3647 return result;
3648}
3649
3650void player::practice( const skill_id &id, int amount, int cap, bool suppress_warning )
3651{
3652 SkillLevel &level = get_skill_level_object( id );
3653 const Skill &skill = id.obj();
3654 std::string skill_name = skill.name();
3655
3656 if( !level.can_train() && !in_sleep_state() ) {
3657 // If leveling is disabled, don't train, don't drain focus, don't print anything
3658 // Leaving as a skill method rather than global for possible future skill cap setting
3659 return;
3660 }
3661
3662 const auto highest_skill = [&]() {
3663 std::pair<skill_id, int> result( skill_id::NULL_ID(), -1 );
3664 for( const auto &pair : *_skills ) {
3665 const SkillLevel &lobj = pair.second;
3666 if( lobj.level() > result.second ) {
3667 result = std::make_pair( pair.first, lobj.level() );
3668 }
3669 }
3670 return result.first;
3671 };
3672
3673 const bool isSavant = has_trait( trait_SAVANT );
3674 const skill_id savantSkill = isSavant ? highest_skill() : skill_id::NULL_ID();
3675
3676 amount = adjust_for_focus( amount );
3677
3678 if( has_trait( trait_PACIFIST ) && skill.is_combat_skill() ) {
3679 if( !one_in( 3 ) ) {
3680 amount = 0;
3681 }
3682 }
3683 if( has_trait_flag( "PRED2" ) && skill.is_combat_skill() ) {
3684 if( one_in( 3 ) ) {
3685 amount *= 2;
3686 }
3687 }
3688 if( has_trait_flag( "PRED3" ) && skill.is_combat_skill() ) {
3689 amount *= 2;
3690 }
3691
3692 if( has_trait_flag( "PRED4" ) && skill.is_combat_skill() ) {
3693 amount *= 3;
3694 }
3695
3696 if( isSavant && id != savantSkill ) {
3697 amount /= 2;
3698 }
3699
3700 if( amount > 0 && get_skill_level( id ) > cap ) { //blunt grinding cap implementation for crafting
3701 amount = 0;
3702 if( !suppress_warning ) {
3703 handle_skill_warning( id, false );
3704 }
3705 }
3706 if( amount > 0 && level.isTraining() ) {
3707 int oldLevel = get_skill_level( id );
3708 get_skill_level_object( id ).train( amount );
3709 int newLevel = get_skill_level( id );
3710 if( is_player() && newLevel > oldLevel ) {
3711 add_msg( m_good, _( "Your skill in %s has increased to %d!" ), skill_name, newLevel );
3712 }
3713 if( is_player() && newLevel > cap ) {
3714 //inform player immediately that the current recipe can't be used to train further
3715 add_msg( m_info, _( "You feel that %s tasks of this level are becoming trivial." ),
3716 skill_name );
3717 }
3718
3719 int chance_to_drop = focus_pool;
3720 focus_pool -= chance_to_drop / 100;
3721 // Apex Predators don't think about much other than killing.
3722 // They don't lose Focus when practicing combat skills.
3723 if( ( rng( 1, 100 ) <= ( chance_to_drop % 100 ) ) && ( !( has_trait_flag( "PRED4" ) &&
3724 skill.is_combat_skill() ) ) ) {
3725 focus_pool--;
3726 }
3727 }
3728
3729 get_skill_level_object( id ).practice();
3730}
3731
3732void player::handle_skill_warning( const skill_id &id, bool force_warning )
3733{
3734 //remind the player intermittently that no skill gain takes place
3735 if( is_player() && ( force_warning || one_in( 5 ) ) ) {
3736 SkillLevel &level = get_skill_level_object( id );
3737
3738 const Skill &skill = id.obj();
3739 std::string skill_name = skill.name();
3740 int curLevel = level.level();
3741
3742 add_msg( m_info, _( "This task is too simple to train your %s beyond %d." ),
3743 skill_name, curLevel );
3744 }
3745}

3752int player::has_recipe( const recipe *r, const inventory &crafting_inv,
3753 const std::vector<npc *> &helpers ) const
3754{
3755 if( !r->skill_used ) {
3756 return 0;
3757 }
3758
3759 if( knows_recipe( r ) ) {
3760 return r->difficulty;
3761 }
3762
3763 const auto available = get_available_recipes( crafting_inv, &helpers );
3764 return available.contains( *r ) ? available.get_custom_difficulty( r ) : -1;
3765}

3767bool player::has_gun_for_ammo( const ammotype &at ) const

3772 } );

3775bool player::has_magazine_for_ammo( const ammotype &at ) const

3779 ( ( it.is_magazine() && it.ammo_types().count( at ) ) ||
3780 ( it.is_gun() && it.magazine_integral() && it.ammo_types().count( at ) ) ||
3781 ( it.is_gun() && it.magazine_current() != nullptr &&
3782 it.magazine_current()->ammo_types().count( at ) ) );
3783 } );
3784}
3785
3786std::string player::weapname() const
3787{
3788 if( weapon.is_gun() ) {
3789 std::string str = string_format( "(%d) [%s] %s", weapon.ammo_remaining(),
3790 weapon.gun_current_mode().tname(), weapon.type_name() );
3791 // Is either the base item or at least one auxiliary gunmod loaded (includes empty magazines)
3792 bool base = weapon.ammo_capacity() > 0 && !weapon.has_flag( "RELOAD_AND_SHOOT" );
3793
3794 const auto mods = weapon.gunmods();
3795 bool aux = std::any_of( mods.begin(), mods.end(), [&]( const item * e ) {
3796 return e->is_gun() && e->ammo_capacity() > 0 && !e->has_flag( "RELOAD_AND_SHOOT" );
3797 } );
3798
3799 if( base || aux ) {
3800 for( auto e : mods ) {
3801 if( e->is_gun() && e->ammo_capacity() > 0 && !e->has_flag( "RELOAD_AND_SHOOT" ) ) {
3802 str += " (" + std::to_string( e->ammo_remaining() );
3803 if( e->magazine_integral() ) {
3804 str += "/" + std::to_string( e->ammo_capacity() );
3805 }
3806 str += ")";
3807 }
3808 }
3809 }
3810 return str;
3811
3812 } else if( weapon.is_container() && weapon.contents.num_item_stacks() == 1 ) {
3813 return string_format( "%s (%d)", weapon.tname(),
3814 weapon.contents.front().charges );
3815
3816 } else if( !is_armed() ) {
3817 return _( "fists" );
3818
3819 } else {
3820 return weapon.tname();
3821 }
3822}
3823
3824bool player::wield_contents( item &container, item *internal_item, bool penalties,
3825 int base_cost )
3826{
3827 // if index not specified and container has multiple items then ask the player to choose one
3828 if( internal_item == nullptr ) {
3829 std::vector<std::string> opts;
3830 std::list<item *> container_contents = container.contents.all_items_top();
3831 std::transform( container_contents.begin(), container_contents.end(),
3832 std::back_inserter( opts ), []( const item * elem ) {
3833 return elem->display_name();
3834 } );
3835 if( opts.size() > 1 ) {
3836 int pos = uilist( _( "Wield what?" ), opts );
3837 if( pos < 0 ) {
3838 return false;
3839 }
3840 internal_item = *std::next( container_contents.begin(), pos );
3841 } else {
3842 internal_item = &container.contents.front();
3843 }
3844 }
3845
3846 if( !container.has_item( *internal_item ) ) {
3847 debugmsg( "Tried to wield non-existent item from container (player::wield_contents)" );
3848 return false;
3849 }
3850
3851 const ret_val<bool> ret = can_wield( *internal_item );
3852 if( !ret.success() ) {
3853 add_msg_if_player( m_info, "%s", ret.c_str() );
3854 return false;
3855 }
3856
3857 int mv = 0;
3858
3859 if( is_armed() ) {
3860 if( !unwield() ) {
3861 return false;
3862 }
3863 inv.unsort();
3864 }
3865
3866 weapon = std::move( *internal_item );
3867 container.remove_item( *internal_item );
3868 container.on_contents_changed();
3869
3870 inv.update_invlet( weapon );
3871 inv.update_cache_with_item( weapon );
3872 last_item = weapon.typeId();
3873
3874 /**
3875 * @EFFECT_PISTOL decreases time taken to draw pistols from holsters
3876 * @EFFECT_SMG decreases time taken to draw smgs from holsters
3877 * @EFFECT_RIFLE decreases time taken to draw rifles from holsters
3878 * @EFFECT_SHOTGUN decreases time taken to draw shotguns from holsters
3879 * @EFFECT_LAUNCHER decreases time taken to draw launchers from holsters
3880 * @EFFECT_STABBING decreases time taken to draw stabbing weapons from sheathes
3881 * @EFFECT_CUTTING decreases time taken to draw cutting weapons from scabbards
3882 * @EFFECT_BASHING decreases time taken to draw bashing weapons from holsters
3883 */
3884 int lvl = get_skill_level( weapon.is_gun() ? weapon.gun_skill() : weapon.melee_skill() );
3885 mv += item_handling_cost( weapon, penalties, base_cost ) / ( ( lvl + 10.0f ) / 10.0f );
3886
3887 moves -= mv;
3888
3889 weapon.on_wield( *this, mv );
3890
3891 return true;
3892}
3893
3894void player::store( item &container, item &put, bool penalties, int base_cost )
3895{
3896 moves -= item_store_cost( put, container, penalties, base_cost );
3897 container.put_in( i_rem( &put ) );
3898 reset_encumbrance();
3899}

3922
3923bool player::uncanny_dodge()
3924{
3925 bool is_u = this == &g->u;
3926 bool seen = g->u.sees( *this );
3927 if( this->get_power_level() < 74_kJ || !this->has_active_bionic( bio_uncanny_dodge ) ) {
3928 return false;
3929 }
3930 tripoint adjacent = adjacent_tile();
3931 mod_power_level( -75_kJ );
3932 if( adjacent.x != posx() || adjacent.y != posy() ) {
3933 position.x = adjacent.x;
3934 position.y = adjacent.y;
3935 if( is_u ) {
3936 add_msg( _( "Time seems to slow down and you instinctively dodge!" ) );
3937 } else if( seen ) {
3938 add_msg( _( "%s dodges so fast!" ), this->disp_name() );
3939
3940 }
3941 return true;
3942 }
3943 if( is_u ) {
3944 add_msg( _( "You try to dodge but there's no room!" ) );
3945 } else if( seen ) {
3946 add_msg( _( "%s tries to dodge but there's no room!" ), this->disp_name() );
3947 }
3948 return false;
3949}

4014
4015int calc_fatigue_cap( int fatigue )
4016{
4017 if( fatigue >= fatigue_levels::massive ) {
4018 return 20;
4019 } else if( fatigue >= fatigue_levels::exhausted ) {
4020 return 40;
4021 } else if( fatigue >= fatigue_levels::dead_tired ) {
4022 return 60;
4023 } else if( fatigue >= fatigue_levels::tired ) {
4024 return 80;
4025 }
4026 return 0;
4027}
4028
4029int player::calc_focus_equilibrium() const
4030{
4031 int focus_equilibrium = 100;
4032
4033 if( activity.id() == ACT_READ ) {
4034 item_location loc = activity.targets[0];
4035 if( loc && loc->is_book() ) {
4036 auto &bt = *loc->type->book;
4037 // apply a penalty when we're actually learning something
4038 const SkillLevel &skill_level = get_skill_level_object( bt.skill );
4039 if( skill_level.can_train() && skill_level < bt.level ) {
4040 focus_equilibrium -= 50;
4041 }
4042 }
4043 }
4044
4045 int eff_morale = get_morale_level();
4046 // Factor in perceived pain, since it's harder to rest your mind while your body hurts.
4047 // Cenobites don't mind, though
4048 if( !has_trait( trait_CENOBITE ) ) {
4049 eff_morale = eff_morale - get_perceived_pain();
4050 }
4051
4052 // as baseline morale is 100, calc_fatigue_cap() has to -100 to apply accurate penalties.
4053 if( calc_fatigue_cap( this->get_fatigue() ) != 0 &&
4054 eff_morale > calc_fatigue_cap( this->get_fatigue() ) - 100 ) {
4055 eff_morale = calc_fatigue_cap( this->get_fatigue() ) - 100;
4056 }
4057
4058 if( eff_morale < -99 ) {
4059 // At very low morale, focus is at it's minimum
4060 focus_equilibrium = 1;
4061 } else if( eff_morale <= 50 ) {
4062 // At -99 to +50 morale, each point of morale gives or takes 1 point of focus
4063 focus_equilibrium += eff_morale;
4064 } else {
4065 /* Above 50 morale, we apply strong diminishing returns.
4066 * Each block of 50 takes twice as many morale points as the previous one:
4067 * 150 focus at 50 morale (as before)
4068 * 200 focus at 150 morale (100 more morale)
4069 * 250 focus at 350 morale (200 more morale)
4070 * ...
4071 * Cap out at 400% focus gain with 3,150+ morale, mostly as a sanity check.
4072 */
4073
4074 int block_multiplier = 1;
4075 int morale_left = eff_morale;
4076 while( focus_equilibrium < 400 ) {
4077 if( morale_left > 50 * block_multiplier ) {
4078 // We can afford the entire block. Get it and continue.
4079 morale_left -= 50 * block_multiplier;
4080 focus_equilibrium += 50;
4081 block_multiplier *= 2;
4082 } else {
4083 // We can't afford the entire block. Each block_multiplier morale
4084 // points give 1 focus, and then we're done.
4085 focus_equilibrium += morale_left / block_multiplier;
4086 break;
4087 }
4088 }
4089 }
4090
4091 // This should be redundant, but just in case...
4092 if( focus_equilibrium < 1 ) {
4093 focus_equilibrium = 1;
4094 } else if( focus_equilibrium > 400 ) {
4095 focus_equilibrium = 400;
4096 }
4097 return focus_equilibrium;
4098}
4099
4100int player::calc_focus_change() const
4101{
4102 int focus_gap = calc_focus_equilibrium() - focus_pool;
4103
4104 // handle negative gain rates in a symmetric manner
4105 int base_change = 1;
4106 if( focus_gap < 0 ) {
4107 base_change = -1;
4108 focus_gap = -focus_gap;
4109 }
4110
4111 // for every 100 points, we have a flat gain of 1 focus.
4112 // for every n points left over, we have an n% chance of 1 focus
4113 int gain = focus_gap / 100;
4114 if( rng( 1, 100 ) <= focus_gap % 100 ) {
4115 gain++;
4116 }
4117
4118 gain *= base_change;
4119
4120 return gain;
4121}
4122
4123void player::update_mental_focus()
4124{
4125 focus_pool += calc_focus_change();
4126}
4127
4128void player::reset_stats()
4129{
4130 const int current_stim = get_stim();
4131
4132 // Trait / mutation buffs
4133 if( has_trait( trait_THICK_SCALES ) ) {
4134 add_miss_reason( _( "Your thick scales get in the way." ), 2 );
4135 }
4136 if( has_trait( trait_CHITIN2 ) || has_trait( trait_CHITIN3 ) || has_trait( trait_CHITIN_FUR3 ) ) {
4137 add_miss_reason( _( "Your chitin gets in the way." ), 1 );
4138 }
4139 if( has_trait( trait_COMPOUND_EYES ) && !wearing_something_on( bodypart_id( "eyes" ) ) ) {
4140 mod_per_bonus( 2 );
4141 }
4142 if( has_trait( trait_INSECT_ARMS ) ) {
4143 add_miss_reason( _( "Your insect limbs get in the way." ), 2 );
4144 }
4145 if( has_trait( trait_INSECT_ARMS_OK ) ) {
4146 if( !wearing_something_on( bodypart_id( "torso" ) ) ) {
4147 mod_dex_bonus( 1 );
4148 } else {
4149 mod_dex_bonus( -1 );
4150 add_miss_reason( _( "Your clothing restricts your insect arms." ), 1 );
4151 }
4152 }
4153 if( has_trait( trait_WEBBED ) ) {
4154 add_miss_reason( _( "Your webbed hands get in the way." ), 1 );
4155 }
4156 if( has_trait( trait_ARACHNID_ARMS ) ) {
4157 add_miss_reason( _( "Your arachnid limbs get in the way." ), 4 );
4158 }
4159 if( has_trait( trait_ARACHNID_ARMS_OK ) ) {
4160 if( !wearing_something_on( bodypart_id( "torso" ) ) ) {
4161 mod_dex_bonus( 2 );
4162 } else if( !exclusive_flag_coverage( "OVERSIZE" ).test( bp_torso ) ) {
4163 mod_dex_bonus( -2 );
4164 add_miss_reason( _( "Your clothing constricts your arachnid limbs." ), 2 );
4165 }
4166 }
4167 const auto set_fake_effect_dur = [this]( const efftype_id & type, const time_duration & dur ) {
4168 effect &eff = get_effect( type );
4169 if( eff.get_duration() == dur ) {
4170 return;
4171 }
4172
4173 if( eff.is_null() && dur > 0_turns ) {
4174 add_effect( type, dur, num_bp );
4175 } else if( dur > 0_turns ) {
4176 eff.set_duration( dur );
4177 } else {
4178 remove_effect( type, num_bp );
4179 }
4180 };
4181 // Painkiller
4182 set_fake_effect_dur( effect_pkill, 1_turns * get_painkiller() );
4183
4184 // Pain
4185 if( get_perceived_pain() > 0 ) {
4186 const stat_mod ppen = character_effects::get_pain_penalty( *this );
4187 mod_str_bonus( -ppen.strength );
4188 mod_dex_bonus( -ppen.dexterity );
4189 mod_int_bonus( -ppen.intelligence );
4190 mod_per_bonus( -ppen.perception );
4191 if( ppen.dexterity > 0 ) {
4192 add_miss_reason( _( "Your pain distracts you!" ), static_cast<unsigned>( ppen.dexterity ) );
4193 }
4194 }
4195
4196 // Radiation
4197 set_fake_effect_dur( effect_irradiated, 1_turns * get_rad() );
4198 // Morale
4199 const int morale = get_morale_level();
4200 set_fake_effect_dur( effect_happy, 1_turns * morale );
4201 set_fake_effect_dur( effect_sad, 1_turns * -morale );
4202
4203 // Stimulants
4204 set_fake_effect_dur( effect_stim, 1_turns * current_stim );
4205 set_fake_effect_dur( effect_depressants, 1_turns * -current_stim );
4206 if( has_trait( trait_STIMBOOST ) ) {
4207 set_fake_effect_dur( effect_stim_overdose, 1_turns * ( current_stim - 60 ) );
4208 } else {
4209 set_fake_effect_dur( effect_stim_overdose, 1_turns * ( current_stim - 30 ) );
4210 }
4211 // Starvation
4212 if( get_kcal_percent() < 0.95f ) {
4213 // kcal->percentage of base str
4214 static const std::vector<std::pair<float, float>> starv_thresholds = { {
4215 std::make_pair( 0.0f, 0.5f ),
4216 std::make_pair( 0.8f, 0.1f ),
4217 std::make_pair( 0.95f, 0.0f )
4218 }
4219 };
4220
4221 const int str_penalty = std::floor( multi_lerp( starv_thresholds, get_kcal_percent() ) );
4222 add_miss_reason( _( "You're weak from hunger." ),
4223 static_cast<unsigned>( str_penalty / 2 ) );
4224 mod_str_bonus( -str_penalty );
4225 mod_dex_bonus( -( str_penalty / 2 ) );
4226 mod_int_bonus( -( str_penalty / 2 ) );
4227 }
4228 // Thirst
4229 set_fake_effect_dur( effect_thirsty, 1_turns * ( get_thirst() - thirst_levels::very_thirsty ) );
4230 if( get_sleep_deprivation() >= sleep_deprivation_levels::harmless ) {
4231 set_fake_effect_dur( effect_sleep_deprived, 1_turns * get_sleep_deprivation() );
4232 } else if( has_effect( effect_sleep_deprived ) ) {
4233 remove_effect( effect_sleep_deprived );
4234 }
4235
4236 // Dodge-related effects
4237 mod_dodge_bonus( mabuff_dodge_bonus() -
4238 ( encumb( bp_leg_l ) + encumb( bp_leg_r ) ) / 20.0f - encumb( bp_torso ) / 10.0f );
4239 // Whiskers don't work so well if they're covered
4240 if( has_trait( trait_WHISKERS ) && !wearing_something_on( bodypart_id( "mouth" ) ) ) {
4241 mod_dodge_bonus( 1.5 );
4242 }
4243 if( has_trait( trait_WHISKERS_RAT ) && !wearing_something_on( bodypart_id( "mouth" ) ) ) {
4244 mod_dodge_bonus( 3 );
4245 }
4246 // depending on mounts size, attacks will hit the mount and use their dodge rating.
4247 // if they hit the player, the player cannot dodge as effectively.
4248 if( is_mounted() ) {
4249 mod_dodge_bonus( -4 );
4250 }
4251 // Spider hair is basically a full-body set of whiskers, once you get the brain for it
4252 if( has_trait( trait_CHITIN_FUR3 ) ) {
4253 static const std::array<bodypart_id, 5> parts{ { bodypart_id( "head" ), bodypart_id( "arm_r" ), bodypart_id( "arm_l" ), bodypart_id( "leg_r" ), bodypart_id( "leg_l" ) } };
4254 for( const bodypart_id &bp : parts ) {
4255 if( !wearing_something_on( bp ) ) {
4256 mod_dodge_bonus( +1 );
4257 }
4258 }
4259 // Torso handled separately, bigger bonus
4260 if( !wearing_something_on( bodypart_id( "torso" ) ) ) {
4261 mod_dodge_bonus( 4 );
4262 }
4263 }
4264
4265 // Apply static martial arts buffs
4266 martial_arts_data->ma_static_effects( *this );
4267
4268 if( calendar::once_every( 1_minutes ) ) {
4269 update_mental_focus();
4270 }
4271
4272 // Effects
4273 for( const auto &maps : *effects ) {
4274 for( auto i : maps.second ) {
4275 const auto &it = i.second;
4276 if( it.is_removed() ) {
4277 continue;
4278 }
4279 bool reduced = resists_effect( it );
4280 mod_str_bonus( it.get_mod( "STR", reduced ) );
4281 mod_dex_bonus( it.get_mod( "DEX", reduced ) );
4282 mod_per_bonus( it.get_mod( "PER", reduced ) );
4283 mod_int_bonus( it.get_mod( "INT", reduced ) );
4284 }
4285 }
4286
4287 Character::reset_stats();
4288
4289 recalc_sight_limits();
4290 recalc_speed_bonus();
4291
4292}
4293
4294safe_reference<player> player::get_safe_reference()
4295{
4296 return anchor.reference_to( this );
4297}
